apps.title: UULA - علا
apps.description:
ودع الدروس الخصوصية ورحب بعلا - المنصة الذكية للمذاكرة و التفوق. اخترنا الأفضل من بين نخبة المعلمين وزودناهم بتكنولوجيا متقدمة لإعادة تشكيل المنهج الدراسي إلى محتوى ملخص ومركز للتعليم الفعال. يتكون منهج علا المنظم للتعليم السريع من ثلاث مكونات رئيسية:





دروس مسجلة متكاملة: صممت لتغطي المنهج كاملاً بطريقة ملخصة ومركزة - دروس علا الفريدة تساعدك للتغلب على أصعب المفاهيم بسهولة





اختبارات ذكية: تمكنك من تقييم قدراتك في أسئلة تماثل الاختبارات الحقيقية وتساعدك على تحديد نقاط ضعفك ثم تقترح محتوى يساعدك للتغلب عليها





مذكرات علا: ترافقك في الدراسة وتعزز فهمك لتجعل تجربتك الدراسية أكثر تأثيرا

raw_data.releaseNotes:
تحديث جديد بانتظارك!
طورّنا مشغّل الفيديو وصفحة الدرس لك من الصفر علشان دراستك تصير أسهل وأرتب. الحين تقدر تدخل وتطلع من الاختبارات وتقدم يتم محفوظ تلقائياً.

جمعنا لك كل الاسئلة والتعاريف المهمة لجميع الدروس في صفحة تدريبات المادة الجديد! اختر الدرس اختبر نفسك واثبت لنا اتقانك لكل درس!

A fresh new update is here!
We’ve completely revamped your video player and lesson page for a smoother study experience. Jump in and out of quizzes easily—your progress is always saved.

We have gathered everything you need to know in one place for you in the new course practice page. Select a lesson and prove your mastery by solving all of its questions and memorizing its key terms!

apps.title: Done! - Happy Productivity
apps.description:
No more overwhelming to-do lists, no more switching between calendars, notes, habits, and reminder apps to manage your day, no more chronic procrastination. The all-in-one productivity app you’ve been searching for is here!

Developed by a team of passionate productivity hackers, researchers, designers and engineers united by a common desire to create a beautiful, simple, intuitive personal productivity app with smart and powerful features.

GOALS
- Create Goals (can be projects, folders, categories)
- Choose a custom color for each Goal
- Connect everything you do to a Goal and track its progress

TASKS & EVENTS
- Organize all your tasks and events in one place
- Create routines with recurring tasks & events
- Reschedule or postpone events with one swipe
- Mark any task Important to move it the top

CALENDARS
- Sync events with iOS and Google calendars
- Choose which calendars you want to see
- Match any Calendar to a Goal

HABITS
- Clean up your to-do list by having a separate section for Habits
- Set daily, weekly, or monthly targets
- Add reminders, build streaks, track your progress
- Review Habits stats and discover how they affect your productivity and wellbeing

FLOW TIMER
- Pomodoro-style timer to focus on one task at a time
- Keep track of how you spend your time
- Stay in the flow by moving from one completed task to the next, without being distracted by seeing your entire to-do list

PRODUCTIVE BREAKS
- Earn breaks as rewards for completed tasks
- Organize and track your breaks
- Pause, recharge, and relax without guilt

STATS & ANALYTICS
- Powerful statistics to better understand self
- See your average day, week, month, year
- Discover your most productive times

LIKED TASKS
- Highlight your favorite tasks and events
- Review and celebrate your accomplishments
- See a list of what made you happy

These features are proven to reduce procrastination and increase work / life satisfaction, based on years of science and research.

Welcome to your new productive life!

--

All user task data is encrypted locally using 256-bit encryption before being sent to the cloud servers for backup, which means the data cannot be read by anyone except the user.

--

Privacy Policy and Terms of Use (EULA)
https://www.done.co/privacy-policy
https://www.done.co/terms-of-service

apps.title: Beekeeper - Digital Workplace
apps.description:
Beekeeper, the all-in-one Frontline Success System, is transforming the way frontline businesses work. Our mobile-first platform helps companies ditch paper and manual processes to improve employee engagement, retention, and performance.

Empower employees with direct access to the people, processes, and systems they need to do their best work. Companies around the world use Beekeeper to connect their teams, unify their systems and drive their businesses forward.

Give your employees one place to look for shift schedules, paystubs, onboarding, training, tasks, safety checklists, announcements, and more.

Use Beekeeper for:

 · Real-time Communication and Collaboration - use chats, streams, surveys, polls, and campaigns that close the loop with your frontline. Communication happens in real-time. And cross-team collaboration can happen anytime and from anywhere with inline translation. 

 · Boosting Frontline Productivity - Replace paper and manual processes with modern ways to get work done. Digitize daily tasks, checklists, and forms to prevent mistakes and save teams time. Automate critical processes to improve your teams’ productivity.

 · File Sharing - share documents, photos and videos with your co-workers.

 · Shift Management - Mobile-first shift notifications built for frontline teams. Easily accommodate employee requests to offer shift flexibility.

 · Streamlining Employee Services - Extend existing HRIS systems so team members can access shifts, pay slips, & training – all from one app on their mobile phones. Services that used to take days can happen in minutes: from PTO requests and shift changes to onboarding or offboarding processes. Automate your workflow by integrating the tools and services you already use, including Workday, ADP, Microsoft Azure, SAP, and more

 · Obtaining Data-Driven Insights on Your Frontline - Capture data that used to be hidden in paper forms and spreadsheets. Managers make better decisions while offering the best possible employee experience.

 · Boosting Employee Engagement and Reducing Turnover - simple employee surveys let you gather critical feedback in minutes and make impactful changes.

 · Fast-Track Frontline Digital Transformation - Save time and IT costs with easy, out-of-the-box integrations, dedicated configuration support, and automated workflows. You can even create custom integrations or workflows with Beekeeper’s open API and suite of tools for developers.

 · Enterprise-Level Security and Compliance - your data and privacy are protected with state-of-the-art encryption.

Made with love in Switzerland.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
Thank you for using our app! We’re excited to bring you new features and improvements in this update.

What’s New:
- We've added emoji reactions to messages! Now you can quickly react and acknowledge any message without typing a word.

Bug Fixes:
- Resolved an issue that could cause attachments to display incorrectly.
- Fixed a problem where Post drafts were not always saved as expected.

We’re committed to delivering a smoother, more reliable app experience. Your feedback is invaluable, and we hope you enjoy these updates!

apps.title: Tiimo: AI Planner & To-do
apps.description:
*  Apple Design Awards Finalist 2024
*  Best Assistive Technology 2022 (Neurodiversity Awards)
*  1+ Million downloads worldwide

Meet Tiimo: Your AI planning partner that simplifies executive function, focus and productivity.

Whether you are building routines, navigating time agnosia, or just trying to make it through a busy week, Tiimo helps reduce mental load and makes it easier to follow through. Planning becomes something that supports you, not something that drains you.
Join 1+ million users who trust Tiimo as their neurodivergent-friendly planner.

KEY FEATURES

AI Co-Planner: A personal planning assistant that supports you in creating, prioritizing and planning tasks that works for you, so you can focus on what matters.
Visual Schedule Planner: Color-coded daily overview with easy drag-and-drop tasks.
To-Do List: Brain dump your tasks, prioritize them in a click with the AI priority grouping.
Focus Timer: A calming countdown to guide your time, and stay on track.
Sync with Apple Calendar and Reminders: Keep all your schedules and plans in one place.
Widgets: Your key tasks and timers always in view on your home or lock screen.
Share up to 5 profiles with family

SUPPORTING TOOLS

Neuroinclusive Courses: Expert guides on productivity and habits
Community Hub: Tips from neurodivergent teens and adults
Personal insights: Stats that support your growth and helping you stay on task.

USER TESTIMONIALS

“Tiimo I love you- you’ve pretty much changed my life!! I didn’t think I could be organized. But this week, I completed 94 tasks. This app def deserves the five stars!"
“I struggle with adhd and have tried multiple apps to help me focus. This has been the only one that has actually helped!”
“This has kept me the most productive I’ve been in years. Worth every penny.”

WHAT SETS US APART

Co-designed with ADHD/Autism experts
100% ad-free forever
Copenhagen-based team fighting for neurodivergent empowerment

FREE TRIAL & PRICING

Start your 7-day trial of Tiimo Pro ( only applies to the yearly subscription) for full features and access to our web version.
Free version includes: Basic planner, limited AI chats, 1 profile.
Auto-renewal can be canceled anytime via Apple settings.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
Thanks for using Tiimo – we're here to help you simplify planning and build better focus.

What's New in This Version:
* Smaller improvements

apps.title: Grammarly: AI Writing Keyboard
apps.description:
Instantly and easily create smart, polished writing with the Grammarly Keyboard. Designed to deliver real-time writing feedback and provide AI assistance, the Grammarly Keyboard works directly in your iPhone and iPad apps, no copy and paste required. 

When you join the millions of people using the Grammarly Keyboard, you’ll benefit from: 

An easy-to-use AI keyboard that works in all your apps
    - Spelling, grammar, and conciseness suggestions 
    - Vocabulary and clarity recommendations (Premium only)
    - Tone detection
    - Tone transformations (Premium only)
    - Multiword text predictions
    - Smart autocorrect and swipe typing
    - Emoji predictions and search bar

Generative AI Rewrites
    - New versions of your entire message in a couple of taps
    - Versions adjust for length, fluency, tone, and more
    - Works in all your favorite apps

A document editor for long-form writing
    - Comprehensive writing feedback
    - Cloud-based document management
    - Personal writing statistics
    - Plagiarism and AI detection
    - Compatible with hardware keyboards

A Safari extension for typing on websites
    - Spelling and grammar checker

Further Improve Your Writing With Grammarly Premium
Grammarly Premium makes your writing more engaging and effective with advanced suggestions for clarity, conciseness, tone, and vocabulary. Premium works across all your devices; just sign in to enjoy its benefits.

If you upgrade to a Premium subscription, payments will be charged to the account associated with your Apple ID. Your subscription will automatically renew unless you cancel at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. After purchase, you can manage your subscription by going to your account settings in the App Store.

Privacy Is Our Priority
Grammarly practices privacy by design. Your words are your own; we will never rent or sell your data. 

User Trust Guidelines: https://www.grammarly.com/trust
Terms of Service: https://www.grammarly.com/terms
Privacy Policy: https://www.grammarly.com/privacy-policy
California Privacy Notice: https://www.grammarly.com/privacy-policy#for-california-users

apps.title: Focusplan: To Do List & Tasks
apps.description:
Focusplan - Your all-in-one planner, calendar, todo list & pomodoro timer app.

Boost your productivity, stay focused, and get more done!

Struggling to stay organized and focused? Focusplan is your ultimate productivity app that combines a task manager, calendar, to-do lists, and the Pomodoro timer technique -  all in one powerful, easy-to-use planner. Whether you’re working, studying, or managing personal projects, Focusplan helps you plan, focus, and achieve your goals.

Key Features

- All-in-One Planner
Manage tasks, to do lists, and events with an integrated calendar.

- Pomodoro Timer
Stay focused with customizable focus & break sessions.

- Task & Subtask Management
Break projects into actionable steps and check them off as you go.

- Calendar Integration
Plan your day, week, or month seamlessly in one place.

- Smart Reminders & Alerts
Stay on track with timely notifications for tasks and sessions.

- Productivity Insights
Track your focus time, completed tasks, and progress over time.

- Distraction-Free Mode
Block out interruptions and stay in deep focus.

- Seamless Sync Across Devices
Access your planner and timers anytime, anywhere.

Why Choose Focusplan?

Focusplan combines the power of planning, organization, and focus into one app. Built around the proven Pomodoro Technique, it helps you:

- Stay organized with tasks and calendar events
- Focus better with structured work sessions
- Beat procrastination and manage your time effectively

Who is Focusplan for?

- Students: Study smarter with structured focus sessions & planning tools
- Professionals: Manage tasks, deadlines, and meetings with ease
- Freelancers: Balance work and personal projects in one app
- Anyone: Whether for learning, working, or personal goals — Focusplan helps you succeed

Take control of your time, focus, and productivity today.
Download Focusplan now and start achieving more!

---

Privacy Policy: https://focusplan.app/privacy
Terms of Service: https://focusplan.app/terms

apps.developer: Shanghai Best Oray Information Technology Co., Ltd.
apps.description:
Sunlogin remote control is a software that supports cross-system and cross-device remote control, supports a variety of system desktop devices and mobile devices, and can be used for remote management, remote assistance, remote equipment maintenance, remote training, remote office, mobile office and other scenarios. The perfect choice for IT operations, after-sales/technical support, gamers, designers, freelancers and business people.

【Main functions】
1. Remote desktop/Remote assistance: mobile phone remote control computer, remote desktop connection, support screen recording and other audit functions. 
2. Mobile screen projection: Project the mobile screen to the computer screen and TV screen. 
3. Remote control of mobile phone: mobile phone control, help others to debug mobile phone remotely. 【Only some mobile phones are supported】
4. Remote games: Mobile phones/computers can control remote computer games, enjoy remote games anytime and anywhere.
5. Remote camera monitoring: In addition to the camera on the computer PC, you can also use the idle mobile phone to call the mobile phone camera.
6. Remote file management: Transfer files between mobile phones, computers and other devices anytime and anywhere.
7. Remote switch: With Sunlogin remote smart plug, realize remote switch of computer, to help you solve the trouble of "how to remote switch when the computer is shut down".
8.CMD/SSH

【Warm reminder】
If you encounter problems, please open the Sunlogin APP- My - Contact us, click on the bottom of the page [online customer service] or [customer work order priority processing] for feedback.

【Automatic renewal of Seed Membership】
-Pumpkin member rights and interests: high-speed file transfer, 2K HD picture quality,  remote mobile devices, remote RDP, multi-screen control multi-screen, and other value-added rights and interests. -Subscription period: 1 month (monthly), 3 months (seasonal), 12 months (annual). -Subscription price: subject to iAP application information, such as RMB 25 per month for continuous monthly products, RMB 55 per quarter for continuous quarterly products, and RMB 128 per year for continuous annual products. -Payment: When the user confirms the purchase and pays, it is credited to the iTunes account. -Cancel Renewal: To cancel renewal, manually turn off automatic renewal in iTunes/Apple ID Settings Management 24 hours before the current subscription period expires. -Renewal: The Apple iTunes account will be charged within 24 hours before the expiration date, and the subscription period will be extended by one subscription period after the payment is successful.

- user agreement: https://service.oray.com/question/33418.htmll
- automatic renewal membership service agreements: https://service.oray.com/question/36365.html

【Automatic Renewal of Super Member】
-Super member benefits: all the function of Seed Membership, 144 high frame remote control, support 3D mouse, gamepad mapping,4K HD image quality, and other value-added benefits.
-Subscription period: 1 month (monthly), 3 months(seasonal), 12 months (annual).

-Payment: the same as Seed Membership

apps.title: Todo - Task List Organizer
apps.description:
This is the original To-Do and Task Management List and one of the most popular, powerful, and award-winning to-do list and task manager iOS and iPad apps ever! Todo has been used by millions of individuals, families and teams for GETTING THINGS DONE. "Todo has stood the test of time" -Silicon Slopes.

Winner of the “Best Productivity App for iPad” (Best Apps Ever, To-Do Apps) and listed among the “Top Ten Paid Productivity Apps..."

"Appigo Todo oozes with awesomeness. I’ve tried numerous iOS task-management apps, and none to date have satisfied me as much as Todo.” –Macworld, 4.5 stars.

Four main reasons to consider Todo:
1. REAL PRODUCTIVITY. Unlike lightweight, freebie or cutesy list tools, Todo 10 is useful when you have a deadline, NEED to focus, prioritize and get things done quickly--from home or school projects to dozens of detailed work tasks.
Includes:  Projects, Sub-tasks, Start Dates, Due Dates, Recurring Tasks (with detailed recurring options), Multiple Task Alerts, Overdue Tasks, Drag and Drop, Search, Print Lists, Folders, and much more.

2. PROVEN GTD METHODOLOGY. Todo uses the popular Getting Things Done approach with Focus To-do Lists, Starred Tasks, Multi-level Priorities, Quick Entry, Context, and Projects with Layered and Prioritized Sub-Tasks—all recommended GTD approaches.

3. BUILT-IN SYNCING. Sync automatically in the background with Todo Cloud Sync. Keep everything in sync, access your data from any device and never be locked into a specific service—your data remains yours.

4. COOLNESS 
• Add, schedule, and organize your to-dos
• Set due dates and reminders to never miss an important date or deadline
• Quickly add tasks using Siri, Email or Todo Cloud’s Quick Add buttons
• Streamline projects, checklists and tasks using customized Siri commands.
• Customize task reminders based on day (January 1), time (2:00pm) and place (when you are near the grocery store)
• Create themed lists to organize your to-dos: home, work, friends, etc.
• Take control of how you view and execute your to-dos with Todo Smart Lists
• Collaborate with friends, family and/or team members using Shared Lists
• Leave yourself (or others) updates through in-task notes and comments
• Create recurring tasks for those to-dos that come over and over again
• Sync your to-dos across all your devices

14 day FREE trial!
Todo Cloud is one of the most affordable individual or team task management solutions. Others cost $10- $50 more per year, and some even require you to pay extra for every platform. Not Todo Cloud.

The Todo subscription will be charged to your credit card through your iTunes account. Your subscription will automatically renew unless cancelled at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. You can cancel the subscription renewal at any time, and the subscription you purchased will remain active until the end of the current period. Manage your subscriptions on the App Store's Account Settings after purchase (http://support.apple.com/kb/ht4098).

EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SUPPORT
Please visit us for help at http://help.appigo.com or email support@appigo.com

Terms of Use - https://appigo.com/terms-of-use/
Privacy Policy - https://appigo.com/privacy-policy/

apps.title: Productivity Master Class
apps.description:
Productivity Masterclass is your ultimate guide to mastering productivity! With 56 in-depth lessons, this app provides clear and practical strategies to boost your efficiency and achieve your goals. Learn through text-based lessons that break down every key aspect of productivity, from time management to goal-setting and overcoming procrastination.

Explore our strategies section, featuring video-based tips from experts on how to maximize your output and stay focused. We also cover common productivity mistakes, offering detailed explanations, solutions, and real-life examples to help you avoid them and stay on track.

Whether you’re a student, professional, or entrepreneur, Productivity Masterclass is designed to help you unlock your full potential and turn your dreams into action!

apps.title: Goodnotes: AI Notes, Docs, PDF
apps.description:
Goodnotes has always been the place to capture your ideas — from quick notes to big plans. Now, it goes further. With powerful AI and new ways to capture information, Goodnotes helps you connect the dots, unlock insights, and turn ideas into action.

*Existing Goodnotes 5 users can continue to use Goodnotes 5 indefinitely or upgrade to the new Goodnotes. Either way, your notes are safe!* 

For professionals: Increase productivity at work
■ Whiteboard + Goodnotes AI: One of our most requested features — brainstorm, mind-map, and diagram freely on an infinite canvas that grows with your ideas. Enhanced diagramming tools and real-time collaboration make it easy for teams to workshop, ideate, and problem-solve together, while Goodnotes AI helps you capture and organize key takeaways instantly. 
■ Goodnotes AI Audio & Meetings: Stay fully present in every conversation while Goodnotes does the work for you. AI-powered transcription and live summarization automatically capture discussions and structure them into clear meeting minutes. After the meeting, merge transcripts with your own notes to create polished, shareable documents in seconds. 
■ Text Documents + AI: Create documents that think with you. Enjoy a superior typing experience with rich inline blocks, build on ideas with external insights, and collaborate seamlessly with teammates. With AI-powered summarization, automated note generation, and transcript support, you can turn rough notes and meetings into finished content faster than ever. 
■ Present your notes, slides, and content directly from Goodnotes when you connect your device via AirPlay or HDMI to an external screen. 
■ Use Laser Pointer to guide your audience’s attention during your presentation.
■ Export your notes to email, print, or share them anywhere as PDFs. 
■ Send a link to your notebooks to work on the same notes directly — perfect for asynchronous work or collaborative brainstorming. 
■ Import documents by emailing them to your custom Goodnotes email. 

For students: Ace your exams with ease
■ Record audio notes that are magically synced to the moment you write — perfect for lectures or presentations.
■ Search and instantly find any of your notes from any class. 
■ Study and practice straight from your notes with Study Sets — flashcards built on active recall and spaced repetition. 
■ Use AI to summarize, shorten, change the tone of your words, and perfect your typed text. 

For planners: Let your creativity flow 
■ Customize the size and color of your paper templates to create the template you want. 
■ Add, create, or import stickers, stamps, washi tapes, images, and more 

Digital notebooks: unlimited notebooks for the price of a single physical one. 
■ Combine handwriting and typed text on one page, alongside images, stickers, diagrams, and doodles. 
■ Create digital notebooks with customizable paper templates, including Blank Paper, Ruled Paper, Cornell Paper, Checklists, Planners, and more. 
■ Navigate long documents with ease. PDF tables of contents are automatically imported; or create custom outlines yourself. 
■ Back up all your notes to Google Drive, Dropbox, or OneDrive, and use iCloud to sync across iPad, iPhone, and Mac — so your notes are always safe. 
■ Edit your writing by resizing it, changing the text color, or moving it to another spot on the page. 
Privacy Policy: https://www.goodnotes.com/privacy-policy
Terms and Conditions: https://www.goodnotes.com/terms-and-conditions

raw_data.releaseNotes:
- The Pen Tool will no longer unexpectedly switch to the Eraser after you use the Lasso Tool.
- Your Toolbar will now stay hidden when you double-tap your Apple Pencil to switch tools.
- We've improved shape recognition when drawing with your pen, especially for geometric drawings.
- Shapes created with by drawing and holding the pen tool can now be rotated.
- You can now remove the outline from your shapes for more creative control.
- Buttons are now more responsive while recording audio.
- The export window now displays correctly on all devices, so you can see every option.
- The copy button for your User ID is back in Account Settings for easy access.
- You can now properly delete the first bullet point in a list.
- Now you can edit diagrams generated with Goodnotes AI if you’re on Goodnotes Pro or have AI Pass. Move shapes, change text, and adjust arrows to make it perfect.

apps.title: DayNinja - Flow & Focus Timer+
apps.description:
DayNinja combines the best productivity methods in the world: Pomodoro technique ™ by Francesco Cirillo, GTD by David Allen, Deep work, timeboxing and more all in one FREE app.
 
Backed by scientifically proven time management methods this free pomodoro focus timer app will help you to be more productive.  Some features include:
 
- Day View: Integrates with your calendar.  See your focus tasks planned out between appointments.
- New Day: DayNinja cleans up old tasks and resets your timers ready for you to re-prioritise focus goals each day.
- KPI Performance streaks: Measure your focus each day and compare with daily performance charts.
- Metrics: Learn how many hours you spend doing focused work, breaks and the time you will finish your workday based on your goals and appointments.
- To-do: prioritise your days’ tasks by drag & drop.
- Target block count & estimates: keep motivated with focus goals, set your personal daily targets.
- Optimised user interface: Quick swipe actions to keep you in flow throughout your day.
- Customise your block & break durations as you grow your ability to focus.
- Tags let you see at a glance related tasks and projects in your todo list.
- Satisfying sounds keep your day light and a smile on your face as you slash through tasks.
- Flow state friendly: keep working when you get in the zone and your focus time is still tracked.
- Focus time summary: receive a report of your total focus time each week.
 
 
The ideal productivity tool for founders, professional freelancers, designers and coders.
 
---
From the author:
 
"Do you know how many hours of your day are actually productive, focused time?
 
Whether it be phone calls, emails, your smartphone or well-meaning colleagues tapping you on the shoulder for a “Do you have a minute?” kind of chat, our days are bombarded with interruptions.  Before we know it, the day is over and we are left feeling rather down and thinking "Eek!? ...Is that all I got done today?"
 
Now let’s just assume that it is possible to work in a quiet place away from external interruptions. Our own minds are an even bigger source of distraction, with a new thought entering our minds every 3 minutes! Unless we have a system, a method, a process - whatever you want to call it, the outcome is likely to be the same day after day: stressful mess bouncing between other people’s agendas and not getting your most important work done. Sound familiar? 
 
This app has been inspired by proven productivity techniques:
 
Pomodoro timer: The idea is to work in predetermined blocks of time. To do this, simply break a task up into 25-minute segments without stopping or getting distracted.
 
Getting Things Done®: Begin with a to-do list for the day and classify tasks according to priority.
 
---
You have allocated tasks, time, all under your own terms, you have achieved your goals, performed every task with a sense of quality and you finish every day satisfied. It sounds simple, and it is…  in concept, but don’t expect to master this technique right away. It takes weeks of practicing the method day in and day out. It takes discipline. I have strayed at times when overwhelmed, I have reached the end of the week and wondered, “Where did I achieve this week”. It is those weeks when I have failed to be disciplined and failed to use the app. I have let other people’s agendas overrun my own.
 
Researchers have proven that self-control is one of the key determinants of success. When you exercise self-control and self-discipline through a good part of your day, it cannot help but spill over into other areas of your life... How you eat, sleep and your health and happiness. Stick with it, and you too will be a DayNinja. 
 
Nathan Challen
theDayNinja.com
 
Want to learn more? read: “Zen and the art of getting Sh*t done” & Medium or subscribe for more productivity tips.

Psst! Looking to induce the flow state more easily? get free training at https://theDayNinja.com

If you are in flow, ignore the the timer alerting you to take a break.  Keep working and when you return to the app you'll be prompted to confirm that you were working up until then.  
Easy! the flow timer is updated and your calendar will reflect you were working that time on the current task.

apps.title: Flofocus: Pomodoro Timer Study
apps.description:
Do you want to study smarter, not harder? Do you want to achieve more in less time? Do you want to enter the flow state and enjoy the process of learning?

If you answered yes to any of these questions, then you need Focus Flow - the best pomodoro timer app for study.

Focus Flow is a simple, elegant, and effective pomodoro timer app that helps you boost your productivity, stay focused, and achieve your goals. Whether you are a student, a professional, or a lifelong learner, Focus Flow will help you optimize your study sessions and get the most out of your time.

Here's how Focus Flow works:

- Choose a task to work on and set a timer for 25 minutes (or any duration you prefer).
- Work on the task without any distractions until the timer goes off.
- Take a short break of 5 minutes (or any duration you prefer) and relax your mind.
- Repeat the cycle until you complete your task or reach your goal.

That's it! You have just used the pomodoro technique, a proven method to improve your focus, concentration, and efficiency.

But Focus Flow is not just a simple pomodoro timer app. It also has some amazing features that make it the best pomodoro timer for study:

- Insightful Statistics: Track your progress and performance with Focus Flow's insightful statistics. See how many sessions you have completed, how much time you have spent, and how productive you have been. Analyze your data and identify your strengths and weaknesses. Improve your study habits and achieve better results.
- Goal Setting: Set goals and milestones to keep yourself motivated and focused. Whether you are preparing for an exam, working on a project, or learning a new skill, Focus Flow helps you set realistic and achievable targets and track your progress. Celebrate your achievements and reward yourself for your hard work.
- Tag Selection: Organize and categorize your tasks with Focus Flow's tag selection feature. Assign tags to your sessions, such as math, physics, history, etc. Track and compare your productivity across different subjects and areas of study. Find out what you enjoy and what you need to improve.
- Beautiful Progress Animation: Enjoy a visually stunning progress animation that keeps you engaged and motivated during your sessions. Watch as the timer fills up with beautiful colors and patterns. Feel the satisfaction and accomplishment as you complete each session.
- Easy Timer Adjustment: Customize your timer settings with ease using Focus Flow. Adjust the duration of your work and break intervals to suit your preferences and study style. Whether you prefer shorter bursts of focus or longer deep work sessions, Focus Flow has you covered.
- Offline Mode: Use Focus Flow offline without any internet connection. No ads, no interruptions, no distractions. Just pure focus and productivity.
- Aesthetic Design: Experience a minimalist and aesthetic design that enhances your study experience. Choose from different themes and colors to match your mood and taste. Enjoy a smooth and intuitive user interface that makes Focus Flow easy and fun to use.

Focus Flow is the ultimate pomodoro timer app for study. It is designed to help you study better, faster, and easier. It is your personal productivity coach, your study buddy, and your secret weapon to ace your exams.

Download Focus Flow today and discover the power of the pomodoro technique. Study smarter, not harder. Achieve more in less time. Enter the flow state and enjoy the process of learning.

apps.title: Focus: Pomodoro Study Timer
apps.description:
I have an exam coming up. A paper due this weekend. And honestly... I don't feel like doing anything. 
Deadlines are looming, tasks are piling up, and I just can't focus on work or study. Sounds familiar?

You're not alone. We all go through these very human moments.

 But don’t worry! There’s a simple yet powerful technique designed to help you: the Pomodoro Technique.
It helps boost your concentration, manage your study and work time, and build momentum using a timer.

 How it works:
1) Set a timer for how long you want to focus on studying or working.  
2) Take a short break when the time ends.  
3) Repeat. 

Sounds too simple? Try it — you’ll be surprised how well it works!

 This app is built on the Pomodoro Technique, refined with user feedback to help you stay on track, stay focused, and get things done.

 Key Features:

1 Customizable Pomodoro Timers  
- For work: 10, 25, 60 minutes   
- For breaks: 1, 5, 30 minutes   
- Set your own durations for maximum flexibility

2 Task Categorization and Time Management  
Track your study time and work sessions by:
- Subject: English, Math, History, Physics...  
- Work type: Emails, Meetings, Writing, etc.  
- Study method: Reading, Listening, Memorizing, Note-taking  
- Other: Programming, Drawing, Practicing, Test prep, Meditation 

3 Visual Progress Review   
Reflect on your focus patterns with helpful graphs:
- "Nice, I stayed on track today."
- "Hmm, hard to focus at home. I’ll try shorter sessions tomorrow."
- "Focus is off today. A quick timer might help."

4 Focus Psychology   
Bite-sized tips and articles on:
- Preventing smartphone distractions   
- Breaking focus-killing habits  
- The science of rest and how to use it wisely

 This app is for you if you're:
- A student prepping for exams, quizzes, or assignments   
- A professional boosting productivity at work   
- A homemaker balancing house chores and personal time   
- A language learner working toward certification 

 It's a small and simple app — just a repeating timer — but it’s made for those who care about focus, productivity, and making each day meaningful.

We hope you’ll give it a try. It just might change the way you work and study!


EULA (Legal Documents)
https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

apps.title: Ultimate Focus - Visual Timer
apps.description:
Introducing Ultimate Focus, your sophisticated and intuitive session-based timer application, designed to optimize your time management skillfully and elegantly.
It encourages you to reflect after each focus session, offering insights that guide you in refining your future focus management. 
With iCloud synchronization, Ultimate Focus is accessible, manageable, and synchronizable anywhere, anytime.
Harness the power of the Pomodoro Technique, elegantly designed within the app, to strike the optimal balance between focus and relaxation periods, ensuring you sustain peak productivity.
Despite adhering to minimalism, Ultimate Focus is rich in customization with over 70 distinct themes, letting you tailor the app according to your individual tastes.

Features:

- Set your focus time effortlessly with a simple finger-drag.
- Remain informed of remaining time with our intuitive pie-chart.
- Select from a wide array of over 70 color themes to design your preferred interface.
- Opt for your ideal alarm sound from our diverse library (premium plan).
- Choose the background music that complements your taste from our expansive collection (premium plan).
- With iCloud synchronization, you can view and modify your focus record on other devices, ensuring seamless continuity (premium plan).
- Utilize widgets to monitor your focus stats on the Home screen.
- Customize your app icon to match the color theme of your choice.
- Manage your focus efficiently by creating a new session for each task.
- The Statistics window offers an immediate overview of your recent focus.
- After each focus session, jot down your task using the retrospect function for future reference.
- Retrospects are easily accessible through the retrospect window and support modification and deletion.
- Utilize the Splitview feature for simultaneous viewing of timer and other apps (for iPad).
- With routine notifications, you can regularly manage your focus.
- Maximize productivity with Pomodoro mode, alternating between focused work and rejuvenating break.
- 
- You can synchronize the focus history with calendar app

If you encounter any issues, have queries, or spot a bug during your use of the app, please feel free to reach us at ultimatefocusapp@gmail.com


Terms of Use : https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

apps.title: Numbers
apps.description:
Numbers is the most innovative spreadsheet app ever designed for a mobile device. 

Get started with one of over 30 Apple-designed templates for your home budget, checklist, invoice, mortgage calculator, and more. Choose from hundreds of powerful functions. Draw and write with Apple Pencil on supported devices, or use your finger. Tap to add tables, charts, text, and images anywhere on the flexible canvas. Touch and drag your finger to reorder columns and rows and to resize tables. Double-tap a cell to bring up the intelligent keyboard that helps you enter text, formulas, dates and times, or duration. Animate your data with interactive column, bar, scatter, and bubble charts. Easily filter through large tables. Find patterns and trends using pivot tables.

Collaborate with others at the same time
• With real-time collaboration, your whole team can work together on a spreadsheet at the same time on Mac, iPad, iPhone, and even on a PC
• Share your spreadsheet publicly or with specific people, see who’s currently in the document with you, and view other people’s cursors to follow their edits
• See a list of recent changes in collaborative spreadsheets, including when people join, comment, and make edits
• Available for spreadsheets stored in iCloud or in Box

Get started quickly
• Over 30 Apple-designed templates give your spreadsheets a beautiful start
• Get quick access to shapes, media, tables, charts, and sharing options
• Import and edit Microsoft Excel spreadsheets
• Import and edit Comma Separated Values (CSV) and tab-delimited text
• Quickly open password-protected spreadsheets using Touch ID or Face ID on supported devices

Beautiful spreadsheets
• Place tables, charts, text, and images anywhere on the flexible canvas
• Add and resize multiple tables on a single sheet
• Use gorgeous preset styles to make your text, tables, shapes, and images look beautiful
• Add an interactive image gallery to view a collection of photos
• Insert photos, music, and video with the Media Browser
• Enhance your spreadsheets with a library of over 700 editable shapes
• Create a form to quickly enter data on the go

Formulas for everyone
• Choose from hundreds of powerful functions, including XLOOKUP and RegEx
• Get function suggestions as soon as you start typing a formula
• Search the integrated function browser for built-in help and sample formulas
• Easily add stock information to spreadsheets

Everything adds up beautifully
• Use Pivot Tables and Smart Categories to see your data in a whole new way
• Quickly organize and summarize tables to gain new insights
• Insert gorgeous 2D and 3D charts, including bar, column, line, area, pie, donut, and radar charts
• Animate data with interactive column, bar, scatter, and bubble charts
• Automatically highlight cells based on rules for numbers, text, dates, and durations
• Easily filter through large tables for specific values, text, or duplicate entries
• Change values in cells using sliders, steppers, checkboxes, pop-ups, and star ratings

iCloud
• Turn on iCloud so you can access and edit your spreadsheets from your Mac, iPad, iPhone, and from a Mac or PC browser at iCloud.com
• Numbers automatically saves your spreadsheet as you make changes

Share a copy of your work
• Export your spreadsheet to CSV, TSV, PDF, and Microsoft Excel
• Use AirDrop to send your spreadsheet to anyone nearby
• Quickly and easily share a link to your work via Mail or Messages

Some features may require Internet access; additional fees and terms may apply.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
• Use over 30 new advanced functions including LET, LAMBDA, FILTER, SORT, and UNIQUE
• See results from a single formula across multiple cells using spilling arrays
• Make text edits using Writing Tools directly in your spreadsheet (requires Apple Intelligence and iOS or iPadOS 18.4)
• Export spreadsheets into other formats using Shortcuts (requires iOS or iPadOS 18.4)
• Improved copy and paste with Freeform (requires iOS or iPadOS 18.4)
• Improved compatibility when importing or exporting Microsoft Excel spreadsheets

apps.title: Pomodoro: Time Management
apps.description:
Stay focused and productive with our Pomodoro Timer app! Use the Pomodoro technique to break down your work into manageable intervals, boost concentration, and achieve your goals. Our app features a Pomodoro timer, Pomodoro productivity helper, and a pomodoro focus timer to help you stay on track.

Do you struggle to complete tasks on time? Do you get less focused on your study or work? Be productive with the  Pomodoro timer focus app. This focus keeper helps you organize your daily routines. 

Key Features
- Simple & elegant interface
- Smart alarms
- Customize focus sessions, goals, and sounds.
- Keep track of your progress
- Endless motivation videos, articles on self-care & productivity 
- Habit tracker feature 
- Daily routine planner to do
- Smart Checklist 
- Custom study timer

The Pomodoro time management technique
The Pomodoro technique is a time management system that encourages people to work or study with the time they have. Using this method, you break your workday into chunks of 25 minutes, separated by a 5-minute break called Pomodoros to maintain motivation and self-care. The Pomodoro timer resembles a tomato. 

The best tasks management and productivity app
The Pomodoro timer app combines the Pomodoro technique and a to-do list to organize your tasks for work and study. The Pomodoro app with its to-do list acts as a routine planner to schedule your daily and weekly tasks.

Features of the Pomodoro timer app
The Pomodoro time management app lets you organize your work to study and work better using the Pomodoro technique. It’s an excellent daily planner.  Following the technique helps challenge your productivity and complete your tasks as per the daily routine planner. apps.description:
Calendars by Readdle is the all-in-one calendar, task manager, daily planner, and habit tracker — seamlessly working across all your Apple devices: Mac, iPhone, iPad, and Apple Watch.
Plan your day, build better habits, boost productivity, and stay organized with powerful features and smooth sync between all your devices.


What you can do with Calendars:
 • View and manage your calendar with daily, weekly, and monthly views
 • Create events, set reminders, and never miss important dates
 • Use the built-in agenda planner to focus on what matters most
 • Organize your to-do list and manage your tasks with ease
 • Quickly add events or to-do items using natural language
 • Build routines and track your habits to stay consistent
 • Take a guided productivity course to improve time management and focus
 • Sync across devices with Google Calendar, iCloud, and more
 • Customize your planner calendar with color coding and widgets
 • Join Zoom, Google Meet, or GoToMeeting directly from your calendar
 • Stay in control of your time, wherever you are
Whether you're planning a busy workday, building new habits, or working on personal growth, Calendars brings everything together to help you own your time — across all your Apple devices.

apps.title: Manus AI
apps.description:
Leave it to Manus

Manus is a general AI agent that bridges mind and action: it doesn't just think, it delivers results. Manus excels at various tasks in work and life, getting everything done while you rest.

From Idea to Execution
Whereas other AI tools stop at brainstorming, Manus sees your ideas to execution. Using its own “computer”, Manus breaks down your task into a to-do list, executes these subtasks, and delivers your final result.

Your Trusted Colleague
Manus works asynchronously in the cloud, meaning that you can simply close your devices and Manus will notify you when your task is complete. You can also stop and edit your prompt at any time. 

Stunning & Structured Slides
With a single prompt, Manus generates entire slide decks tailored to your needs. Whether you're presenting in a boardroom, a classroom, or online, Manus ensures your message lands. Once you are done, export or share it with colleagues and peers.

Free & Unlimited Chat
Ask any question, get instant answers. Need more power? One-click upgrade to Agent Mode with advanced capabilities from asking simple questions to creating comprehensive outputs.

Design & Deploy Websites 
Manus turns any file into an engaging website with one prompt. Spreadsheets, slides, images, resumes, books... All your files can be more sharable, interactive, and visually impressive as a website.

Image & Video Generation
For both image and video, Manus transforms simple prompts into complete stories. Whether it’s creating a poster froma piece of crumpled paper or a high fashion concept, Manus brings your inner artist to life. 

Reclaim your time
Tasks that used to take 20 hours can be reduced to one with Manus. Whether that’s turning complex data into visual representations or automating repetitive routines, leave it to Manus so that you can turn your attention to engaging tasks.

Privacy Policy: https://manus.im/privacy
Terms of Use: https://manus.im/terms

- AI Web Apps: Build full-stack web applications with databases, user authentication, and embedded AI capabilities
- 4x Faster: Re-architected engine completes tasks in under 4 minutes on average, down from 15 minutes
- Higher Quality: 15% improvement in task quality with smarter reasoning and better results
- Expanded Context: Handle larger, more complex problems with improved coherence across longer workflows
- Team Collaboration: Invite team members to work together with Manus in shared sessions
- Manus-1.5-lite: New cost-efficient agent option available to all users

apps.title: Pomodoro Technique -Simple-
apps.description:
Pomodoro Technique is a time management technique for sustained concentration.
By repeating 25 minutes of work time and 5 minutes of rest time, you can improve the efficiency of your work.
By eliminating all unnecessary functions, Pomodoro Timer allows you to start working right away with the touch of a button after launching the application.

ーーーーーーーーーーーーーー
ABOUT SUBSCRIPTIONS

・Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase.

・Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period.

・Account will be charged for renewal within 24hours of the end of the renewal will be provided.

・Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase.

・You can cancel your subscription by entering the following address: https://support.apple.com/en-us/HT202039

PRIVACY POLICY

We take your privacy very seriously.

・Your data is not shared, The data is saved only your device.

・We Collect anonymous app usage statistics and crashes reports. All data is anonymous and is only used to fix bugs, crashes, and improve the app.

・If you have any questions about these Terms or the Services, please use our contact form.

TERMS OF USE

Your use of the app and services are at your own risk. The app and services are provided "as is" without any warranty of any kind. We hereby disclaim all other warranties, express or implied, including implied warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose and non-infringement.

apps.title: Focus Farm: Study Timer
apps.description:
FOCUS FARM: THE FUN WAY TO STAY PRODUCTIVE

Join Rusty and thousands of users transforming their productivity with Focus Farm

Focus Farm is the intuitive and engaging app that turns your productivity sessions into an exciting farming journey. Grow crops, make deliveries, and upgrade your very own grid-based farm—all while mastering the art of focus. Whether you’re studying, working, managing ADHD, or just looking to build better habits, Focus Farm is your ideal productivity companion

WHY FOCUS FARM?

Trusted by students, professionals, and productivity enthusiasts worldwide, Focus Farm keeps you motivated and focused:

- Plant and harvest crops by completing productive sessions
- Upgrade and customise your farm tiles for a personalised farming experience
- Deliver goods to the farm shop to earn rewards
- Stay accountable with engaging, gamified productivity

KEY FEATURES

- Pomodoro Timer: customise your focus sessions with structured intervals and breaks to maximise productivity
- Phone Lock: block distractions and enforce focused periods seamlessly
- ADHD Friendly: specifically designed tools to improve attention, manage hyperactivity, and support a dopamine detox
- Farm Upgrades: use earned rewards to expand and enhance your farm
- Progress Tracking: visualise your productivity journey with intuitive progress charts and milestones

MADE FOR EVERY PRODUCTIVITY JOURNEY

Beginner or productivity pro, Focus Farm supports every step of your journey:

- Students: ace exams, complete assignments, and build lasting study habits
- Professionals: enhance productivity, manage tasks, and streamline workflows
- ADHD Management: specialised tools and timers for sustained attention and improved focus

LEVEL UP WITH YOUR FOCUS FARM TITLE DEED

apps.title: Do It - Productivity Manager
apps.description:
Description for DoIt - Productivity Manager


- Organize, Prioritize, and Achieve More with DoIt - Productivity Manager!
Struggling to keep up with your tasks, deadlines, or personal projects? DoIt - Productivity Manager is your personal task management assistant, designed to help you stay productive, organized, and stress-free. Whether it’s work, personal tasks, or a shopping list, we’ve got you covered.

Key Features:

- Create, Organize, and Manage Tasks
Easily create tasks, assign due dates, and organize them by categories such as Work, Personal, WishList, or custom categories that you define. Stay on top of every project with neatly structured lists.

- Smart Scheduling and Due Dates
- Set deadlines for each task.
- See when a task is due today, upcoming, pending, completed or overdue.
- View tasks by categories or prioritize them.

- Detailed Descriptions
Add rich descriptions or notes to each task. Need to remember specific details for a meeting or project? No problem! Every task comes with room for as much information as you need.

Powerful Features to Boost Productivity:
- Categorize Your Tasks
Assign tasks to predefined categories like Work, Personal, or WishList, or create your own categories to personalize your workflow. Use the built-in filter to quickly find tasks in any category.


- Sync Across All Devices
Your tasks are automatically synced through Firebase, ensuring you can access them anytime, anywhere—on any Apple devices.

- Add Color to Your Categories
Easily distinguish your task categories making it visually simple to prioritize tasks.

- Secure and Cloud-Synced:
With Firebase Authentication and Firestore, your tasks and sensitive data are securely stored and synchronized across all devices. Rest assured knowing your data is protected with industry-standard encryption.

Simple Yet Powerful Task Views:

- Overdue Tasks: Highlight and tackle tasks that have slipped through the cracks.

- Completed Tasks

apps.title: 3 Tasks - Daily
apps.description:
Most to-do apps overwhelm you with endless lists. 3 Tasks keeps it simple: choose the three tasks that matter most and get them done. This method is backed by productivity experts as one of the most effective ways to focus.

Features:
• Write down your 3 daily priorities
• Start and pause tasks anytime (Pomodoro-style)
• Track time spent on each task
• Clean, distraction-free interface
• No clutter, no bloat—just one simple screen
• Pleasant Tic-Tac sound to stay engaged
• One-time purchase. No subscriptions.

Why it works:
When you can only do three things per day, you start choosing what’s truly important. That focus leads to massive productivity gains without burnout.

Our story:
After trying every productivity app out there, we realized what we really needed didn’t exist: an app that forces focus on just 3 tasks a day. So we built it.

Privacy & Trust:
We never track you, never collect your data, and never run ads.
Terms of Use: https://sagalab.co/terms.html
Privacy Policy: https://sagalab.co/privacy.html

raw_data.releaseNotes: - Bug fixes and performance improvements

apps.title: LogMeIn Pro & Central
apps.description:
Get secure anytime, anywhere access to your computers from your iPad or iPhone.

LogMeIn Pro & Central gives LogMeIn Pro and Central subscribers remote access to PCs and Macs over Wi-Fi or mobile data. 
Note: to use this free app you must first have a LogMeIn subscription on the computer(s) you want to access.  

****************

How to use:
1. Install the app
2. Go to the PC or Mac you want to access and install the LogMeIn software.
3. Launch the app from your iPhone or iPad to access your computer
For detailed step-by-step instructions, please read the LogMeIn Getting Started Guide. 

With LogMeIn Pro & Central you can:
• Access your home and work computers on the go
• Control your Mac or PC as if you’re sitting right in front of it
• Get to your computer files and edit them from your iPad/iPhone
• Remotely run any application on your computer from your iPad/iPhone

Features include: 
• Mouse and screen settings – choose your preferred method of remote control with scroll mode
• Magnifying glass and zoom slider – zoom by mouse, slide or with your fingers
• Quick access to your files with File Manager – save files directly to your iPhone or iPad so you can work on them offline, or move and copy files between devices.
• Change display color, resolution and network speed to maximize remote control performance. 
• HD video and sound – watch videos located on your computer in HD and sound stream remotely
• Photo App Management – easily access and transfer photos
• Attach any number of files, including photos and emails
• Multi-monitor view – shake your device or three-finger swipe to switch between monitors

****************

We love your feedback!
X/Twitter: @GoTo

raw_data.releaseNotes: LogMeIn has been rebranded as LogMeIn Pro & Central. The application now features a minor update to its icon. All functionality remains unchanged, so you can continue using the application as usual.

apps.title: Cozi Family Organizer
apps.description:
Cozi Family Organizer is the surprisingly simple way to manage everyday family life. With a shared calendar, reminders, grocery list and more, Cozi is a 3-time Mom’s Choice Award Winner and The TODAY Show “must-have app” for a better life.

Cozi is free, easy to use, and available from any mobile device or computer.

FAMILY CALENDAR
• Keep track of everyone’s schedules in one place with a simple color-coded calendar
• Set reminders for yourself or others in the family so no one misses practice or an important event
• Send automated daily or weekly agenda emails to any family member
• Subscribe to other calendars you use like your work calendar, school calendars, personal calendars, and team schedules.

SHOPPING LISTS & TO DO LISTS
• Everyone in the family will always know what you need at the grocery store
• See items added by other family members in real time, and never forget the one thing you really need to make dinner
• Create to do lists for anything - a shared to do list for the whole family, chore checklists for the kids, a vacation packing checklist.

RECIPE BOX
• Organize all your recipes in one place that's accessible anytime, anywhere - at home or at the store
• Add ingredients to your shopping list quickly and schedule meals onto your calendar
• Cook from your phone with helpful features like the no-dim button that keeps your screen on while you're cooking

MORE ABOUT COZI
• Your Cozi calendar, shopping lists, to do items, and recipe box are accessible from any mobile device or computer
• No matter where or how your family signs in to Cozi, everyone will be looking at the same information
• The whole family shares one account that everyone can access using their own email address (as specified in Settings) and the shared family password

RAVE REVIEWS ABOUT COZI
• "Cozi is, in short, ridiculously handy. My only regret is that I waited this long to start using it." –PC World
• "Cozi just works. It looks clean, organized and uncluttered, regardless of hectic schedules." –The Wall Street Journal
• "This thing is indispensable for busy families" –CNET
• "Cozi is a FlyLady-approved application." –The FlyLady

COZI GOLD 
All the features listed above are free. Cozi also offers an optional ad-free premium subscription called Cozi Gold which gives you additional features, including access to add, edit and view events more than 30 days ahead, more reminders, mobile month view, change notifications, and birthday tracker.

Your subscription is charged to your credit card through your Apple account. Your subscription automatically renews each year within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. You may cancel your subscription at any time by turning off auto-renew in your Apple account at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. You can manage your subscription in the App Store app.

Cozi privacy policy: www.cozi.com/privacy-policy/
Cozi terms of use: www.cozi.com/terms-of-use/

raw_data.releaseNotes:
Thank you for using Cozi!

This update includes a few minor changes to improve your Cozi experience.

If you have any questions, problems, or feedback, please contact us anytime at help@cozi.com so we can help you directly.

apps.title: Pages
apps.description:
Pages is the most beautiful word processor you’ve ever seen on a mobile device. Start with an Apple-designed template to instantly create gorgeous reports, digital books, resumes, posters, and more. Or use a blank document and create your own design. Easily add images, movies, audio, tables, charts, and shapes. You can even draw and annotate using Apple Pencil on supported devices, or use your finger. Pages has been designed exclusively for iPad and iPhone.

Draw and annotate using Apple Pencil or your finger
• Easily add drawings with pen, pencil, crayon, and fill tools, then animate them and watch them come to life
• Use Smart Annotation to add comments and marks that stay anchored to their associated text
• Convert your handwritten words to typed text with Scribble and Apple Pencil

Collaborate with others at the same time
• With real-time collaboration, your whole team can work together on a document at the same time on Mac, iPad, iPhone, and even on a PC
• Share your document publicly or with specific people, see who’s currently in the document with you, and view other people’s cursors to follow their edits
• See a list of recent changes in collaborative documents, including when people join, comment, and make edits
• Available for documents stored in iCloud or in Box

Get started quickly
• Choose from over 90 Apple-designed templates to instantly create beautiful reports, digital books, resumes, cards, posters, and more
• Use Screen View on iPhone to automatically display text, images, and other elements in a continuous flow optimized to fit your screen so documents are even easier to read and edit
• Get quick access to shapes, media, tables, charts, and sharing options
• Import and edit Microsoft Word and text files
• Quickly open password-protected documents using Touch ID or Face ID on supported devices

Create beautiful documents
• Format your document with gorgeous styles, fonts, and textures
• Enhance your document with a library of over 700 editable shapes
• Easily add images, video, and audio
• Add an image gallery to view a collection of photos on the same page
• Create interactive EPUB books that can be shared with others or published to Apple Books for download or purchase

Advanced tools
• Use the table of contents view to easily navigate your document or book
• Add comments and join threaded conversations
• Turn on change tracking to mark up a document as you edit it
• Add bookmarks to easily link from one part of your document to another
• View pages side by side as you work
• Turn on facing pages to format your document as two-page spreads
• Create page templates to keep the design consistent across your page layout document
• Add linked text boxes so text easily flows from one place to another
• Create footnotes and endnotes and view character, word, and paragraph counts
• Add elegant mathematical equations using LaTeX or MathML notation
• Use presenter mode to easily read and auto scroll text while giving a speech

iCloud
• Turn on iCloud so your documents are automatically available on your Mac, iPad, iPhone, and from a Mac or PC browser at iCloud.com
• Pages automatically saves your documents as you make changes

Share a copy of your work
• Use AirDrop to send your document to anyone nearby
• Quickly and easily share a link to your work via Mail or Messages
• Export your document in EPUB, Microsoft Word, RTF, TXT, and PDF format
• Print wirelessly with AirPrint, including page range selection, number of copies, and two-sided printing

Some features may require Internet access; additional fees and terms may apply.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
• Screen View on iPad displays text, images, and other elements in a continuous flow optimized to fit your screen
• Make text edits using Writing Tools directly in your document (requires Apple Intelligence and iOS or iPadOS 18.4)
• Add additional pages into a word-processing document more easily
• Export documents into other formats using Shortcuts (requires iOS or iPadOS 18.4)
• Improved copy and paste with Freeform (requires iOS or iPadOS 18.4)

apps.title: Focused Work - Pomodoro Timer
apps.description:
## Featured by App Store in 150+ Countries & Regions
# Hot This Week
# Apps We Love Right Now
# Big Apps From Small Teams
# New Apps, Features, and Content

## What People Are Saying

"A simple, but valuable utility for creating timed focus sessions of productivity." - MacStories
"Focused Work helps you stay on track better than ever" - iMore
"Focused Work makes it easy to create and manage Focused Sessions." - 9to5Mac
"A tool that helps overcome that first step." - Knapsack

Focused Work is a powerful timer that helps you focus and be productive.

It's purpose-built for people who want to focus for long periods and struggle with this.

Add structure to your day with "Focus Sessions" that encourage you to complete goals, tasks, and help you divide your time into Focus, Break, and Prepare stages.

Pick from a selection of templates, including a simple timer, Pomodoro - inspired by the Pomodoro Technique, Flowmodoro - inspired by the Flowtime Technique, and other various sessions.

You can also create repeatable sessions specifically tailored to your needs. Add stages, set time limits, and much more.

Ultimately, Focused Work helps you be more accountable by reminding you to focus, reflect, and build healthy productivity habits by completing various daily goals.


**Core Features**

· A simple, powerful timer that keeps you on-task
Choose what to focus on. Start the timer. Get stuff done!

· Curated Basic Sessions to get started
Run a Pomodoro session, Flowmodoro session, or even just a simple timer

· Create Focus Sessions
Tailor them to your needs with a plethora of configurable options

· Reminders
Be reminded to stay focused, when to take breaks, and also to start a focus session!

· Reflection
Track what went well for you during your focus session and what you can improve upon

· Scratch Pad
Jot down thoughts that come to mind during your session and return to them after

· Daily Goals
Completing your daily focus goals earns you a streak and helps you form healthy productivity habits

· Statistics & Charts
Review recent productivity across the past week, month, and year

· Block Distractions
Select apps and websites you want to restrict access to during a session

· In-app Shortcuts Automation
Automatically perform actions as you progress through your session, such as turning on Focus

· Link with Toggl Track
Explore advanced time tracking by linking with Toggl to create time entries, assign projects and tags

· Productivity Export
Export completed sessions in CSV format


**iOS & iPadOS Features**

Focused Work is available on iPhone, iPad, and Mac, with extensive support for each platform;

· Live Activities
Control your session from the Lock Screen or Dynamic Island

· Interactive Widgets
Control your session, view daily goals, and start a session from the Home Screen

· Control Center Widgets
Start a session or access the Scratch Pad with Control Widgets

· StandBy
Interact with your session while iPhone is in StandBy

· Spotlight Search
Quick start and interact with sessions from search

· Focus Filters
Filter which sessions can be viewed & started based on the active Focus

· App Shortcuts & Siri
Start and interact with a session via various shortcuts that can also be linked together

· Picture-in-Picture
Show a floating timer above other apps with Picture-in-Picture mode

· Session Alerts on all devices
Start a session on one device and receive update alerts on others with Focused Work installed

· iCloud Syncing
Sync productivity stats & created sessions between devices

· Privacy Focused
Your data is securely stored and managed via iCloud. No account registration.

· And much more
Mac Support, Share Sheet controls, App Icons, Keyboard Shortcuts, VoiceOver, Split View & Slide Over, Low Power Mode, Drag & Drop, Dark Mode, URL Schemes


If you have any questions, please reach out to focusedworkapp@michaeltigas.com.au

Privacy Policy: https://focusedwork.app/privacypolicy/
Terms of Use: https://focusedwork.app/terms/

raw_data.releaseNotes:
Thank you for using Focused Work in 2025!

This update improves support for the latest version of iOS and iPadOS, including minor bug fixes.

We hope you find them super helpful for your productivity. Please leave a kind review if you do! :)

apps.title: Momentum Productivity
apps.description:
MOMENTUM PRODUCTIVITY: Elevate Your Personal Development Journey

Welcome to Momentum Productivity, the ultimate personal development application designed to optimize your productivity and enhance your overall well-being. With a focus on aligning your personal, physical, and mindfulness goals, Momentum empowers you to achieve success in all areas of your life.


FEATURES:


Task Management
Streamline your tasks and turn them into triumphs with our beautifully simple task organization feature. Add tasks, track your progress, and unleash your productivity potential without any limits holding you back.


Challenges
Transform your daily tasks into a game of victories by participating in challenges and building streaks. Experience the satisfaction of streamlining your daily wins and leveling up your personal growth journey with Momentum's challenge feature.

PlanAI
Introducing PlanAI, your personal AI task assistant built into Momentum. Whether you're overwhelmed or just want to save time, PlanAI helps you organize your tasks, prioritize what matters, and build your week. Just describe what you need, and PlanAI will break it down into a clear, actionable plan.

Week Planning / Custom Task View
Gain a comprehensive view of your upcoming week with our intuitive week-planning feature. Never miss important appointments, family gatherings, or special occasions again, ensuring you stay organized and on top of your commitments.


Detailed Insights
Harness the power of detailed insights provided by our dashboard to analyze your past performance and identify areas for improvement. Stay motivated to enhance your productivity and build a winning streak with every accomplishment.


Focus with Pomodoro Timer
Take your focus to new heights with our integrated Pomodoro timer. Seamlessly integrate focused work sessions with any task, maximizing your efficiency and productivity with each session.

See for yourself the power of Momentum Productivity, and unlock your full potential today. Download now and embark on a journey towards greater productivity, mindfulness, and personal development.

PREMIUM FEATURES
Unlock the full potential of your productivity journey with our subscription plans tailored to meet your needs:
Unlimited Tasks 
Access to PlanAI Assistant
Create my Week View
Utilize task-integrated Pomodoro Timer
Birthday Calendar / Important Dates
Ability to join all challenges / create your own


Immerse yourself in seamless productivity, and embrace the power of Momentum. 

Please note that these prices apply to customers in the United States, and pricing in other countries may vary, with actual charges converted to your local currency based on your country of residence. 

Payment will be conveniently charged to your iTunes Account upon subscription confirmation. Auto-renewal ensures uninterrupted access, but you have the flexibility to manage this feature. 

Easily turn off auto-renew at least 24 hours before the current period ends through your iTunes account settings. For hassle-free management, explore the "Manage Subscription" menu option in the App Settings menu or make adjustments in your Account Settings. Elevate your productivity journey with Momentum Productivity today!

Please review our privacy policy here: https://www.momentumproductivity.com/terms-policy 
Visit our website here: https://www.momentumproductivity.com/
EULA (Terms of Use): https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

apps.title: Working Methods, Rules, Model
apps.description:
Boost your productivity with Effortless Working! 
Our app offers a variety of working methods and tools to help you complete tasks with ease. 
From time management to business frameworks, our app provides strategies for every aspect of your job. 
With 9 different frameworks to choose from, you'll find the perfect fit for your unique needs. 
Take notes, track progress, and optimize your workflow. 
Start working smarter, not harder, with Effortless Working.

apps.title: Tasks - Designed to make you productive
apps.description:
Tasks is designed to make you more productive by better managing your time. This is based on the technique followed by the legendary General and former president of the the United States Dwight D. Eisenhower. This method was made popular by Stephen Covey in his popular title “The 7 Habits of Highly Effective People”.

Usage:
Just drag the ‘+’ icon to any quadrant to create a new tasks. Simple. You can move the existing tasks to other quadrants by dragging the task across. Once you are done with a task swipe right to mark it complete. If you want to delete a task just swipe left. Want to be notified on due dates? select the ‘bell’ icon and set a due date. When a task is due in the next 24 hours it shows a red marker on the task. If the marker is yellow it means that the card is due in the 48 hours. If the due date is beyond 48 hours the marker will be green in color. If you see a blue marker it means there is not due date for that task.

How to use tasks effectively
Eisenhower’s strategy for taking action and organizing your tasks is simple. Using the decision matrix below, you will separate your actions based on four possibilities.

- Urgent and important (tasks you will do immediately).
- Important, but not urgent (tasks you will schedule to do later).
- Urgent, but not important (tasks you will delegate to someone else).
- Neither urgent nor important (tasks that you will eliminate).

The great thing about tasks app is that it can be used for broad productivity plans (“What should i plan for the coming week?”) and for managing checklists related to certain tasks (ex: Grocery shopping list).

apps.title: RewardMe: Productivity Rewards
apps.description:
RewardMe is the ultimate app to boost your productivity, achieve personal goals, and stay motivated through a unique reward system. Whether you're a student searching for more structure, someone fighting procrastination, or an individual on a self-improvement journey, RewardMe combines gamified productivity with personalized motivation to help you reach your goals efficiently.

How RewardMe Transforms Your Productivity:
1. Set Personal Goals: RewardMe allows you to choose rewards that genuinely matter to you. Whether it’s an hour of gaming, a relaxing movie night, or indulging in a favorite activity, these rewards are unlocked only after you complete the tasks you've set for yourself. This personalized reward system keeps you driven to achieve your personal goals.

2. Efficient Task Management: With RewardMe, managing tasks becomes straightforward and rewarding. Create a detailed list of tasks you need to complete before accessing your chosen reward. Each task is a step closer to your goal, turning your daily to-do list into a motivating path toward personal satisfaction.

3. Enjoy Your Well-Earned Rewards: Once all your tasks are completed, you can enjoy your chosen reward. This approach ensures that you stay focused and productive, making goal achievement a rewarding and enjoyable experience. By linking tasks to rewards, RewardMe helps you maintain high productivity levels while also ensuring that you take time to enjoy the things you love.

Ideal For: Students: Balance study and leisure. Procrastinators: Beat procrastination with task-based rewards. Self-Improvers: Achieve fitness or learning goals. Digital Natives: Stay productive offline without distractions.

Why RewardMe is the App You Need:
1. Comprehensive Reward System: RewardMe is built around a powerful reward system that motivates you to be productive. By linking your favorite activities to task completion, the app ensures that you stay focused on your goals. Whether it’s earning time to play video games, watch your favorite shows, or relax, RewardMe turns your everyday goals into something to look forward to.

2. Gamified Productivity: Transform your daily tasks into a fun and engaging experience with RewardMe. The app turns task completion into a game, where every completed task gets you closer to your reward. This gamified approach makes productivity more enjoyable and helps you stay motivated, even on tough days.

3. Achieving Personal and Professional Goals: Whether you’re setting small daily goals or working toward larger, long-term achievements, RewardMe provides the tools you need to succeed. The app’s structured approach helps you systematically achieve both personal and professional milestones, ensuring continuous growth and success.

4. Productivity Booster – Anytime, Anywhere: RewardMe is your ultimate productivity booster, helping you keep track of your progress and stay motivated. The app’s offline functionality means you can work on your goals anytime, anywhere, without needing an internet connection. This ensures that you can focus on what’s important without distractions, boosting your productivity in any environment.

5. Tailored for Your Success: RewardMe is designed to adapt to your personal and professional needs. Whether you’re managing daily tasks, pursuing self-improvement, or looking to overcome procrastination, RewardMe’s flexible and intuitive interface makes it easy to stay organized and motivated. The app’s reward system is fully customizable, allowing you to set rewards that truly motivate you, keeping your productivity high and your goals within reach.

Start using RewardMe today and discover how easy and enjoyable it is to achieve your goals. Perfect for anyone looking to boost productivity, stay motivated, and enjoy well-earned rewards. RewardMe turns your ambitions into achievable milestones, all while making the process fun and rewarding.

apps.title: FlexList: A Productivity Tool
apps.description:
FlexList is a to-do list and productivity app designed to help you set up your day, your way. With FlexList, you can easily create tasks at the tap of a button, monitor progress with fun meters, prioritize tasks, assign due dates and more! Keeping your life organized and productive is all made easy using this application.

Features and Benefits:
- Progress Ring: Choose your color and featured lists to be shown in your progress meter. Continue to check off your tasks and watch the ring fill until you have completed all your items. 
- Priority Ranking: When adding in items choose the priority level of your tasks. High priority tasks will stay at the top of your list, mid priority in the middle and low priority at the bottom.  
- Due Dates: Each new task has the option to input a due date and time. Use this feature to prioritize your tasks and keep track of when each time sensitive task is due. 

If you are loving using Flexlist, please let us know by leaving a review!
