apps.title: Yuppa
apps.description:
Boost Your Productivity today!

Achieve your goals faster and more efficiently with Yuppa, the ultimate productivity app designed to help complete your tasks and projects. Your go-to tool for managing your time, tracking costs, and optimizing your workflow. 

Key Features:
- Progress Monitoring: Start working on your tasks, pause and resume as needed, and get a detailed view of the time spent until completion. Effortlessly track your progress and stay on schedule.

- Cost Tracking: Set your hourly rate and let us do the math. With cost tracking, you can easily calculate the cost of each task and manage your budget more effectively.

- Statistics: Gain valuable insights into your productivity with detailed statistics. Monitor your progress on projects and make data-driven decisions to improve your workflow.

- Kanban Methodology: Keep track of your work's progress using the Kanban methodology. Move tasks between "To-do," "In progress," and "Done" to stay organized and focused.

AI Assistant:
- Tasks Generation: Creating a list of tasks for a project is time consuming and not that fun, right?. But don't worry, just tell us what it's about and we'll generate all the tasks for you, saving you valuable time.

- Step by Step: Break down large and complex tasks into smaller, more manageable steps with the "Step by Step" AI feature. Simplify your workload and tackle projects with ease.

- Learn More: Save time and eliminate the hassle of manual browsing. The "Learn More" AI feature provides a brief description of the expected outcome for your tasks in seconds.

- Proofread: Ensure your work is error-free with our powerful "Proofread" AI feature. Improve the writing and correct grammatical, spelling, and punctuation errors effortlessly.

Ready to transform the way you work? Download Yuppa now and unlock your full potential!

By downloading this app, you agree to Apple's standard End User License Agreement (EULA): 
https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

If you choose to purchase a Yuppa Pro subscription, payment will be charged to your Apple account, and your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period. Auto-renewal may be turned off at any time by going to your settings in the App Store after purchase.
Privacy Policy: https://www.yuppa.app/privacy-policy
Terms of Service: https://www.yuppa.app/terms-of-service

raw_data.releaseNotes:
- We fixed a bug related to Apple and Google sign-in.
- The time worked calculation in the stats page has been fixed.

apps.title: What's Next? (productivity)
apps.description:
Do you struggle with deciding what to do when you have free time?
Are your tasks and interests piling up on your plate? Lots of starting things, rarely finishing?
Is it difficult to keep track of some tasks when your schedule is full?



When you have 5, 15, or 50 minutes free...
Let us help you decide What's Next.


Enter your tasks, assign priorities, and even deadlines. Your recommended tasks are influenced by how important and imminent they are.


Be it short or long, incremental progress ... is still progress! 

This app started as a personal tool and is now being developed and shared with you. A tool for growth, that will grow with you. Stay tuned for more updates in the coming weeks.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
Updated, modern UI!
New, fun task display.
Major bug fixes on settings screen.
New statistics view on tracking sessions.

apps.title: Focus Dog: Productivity Timer
apps.description:
1) Start a focus challenge with our gamified productivity app and earn rewards such as donuts, gems, and coins.
2) Build the habit of responsible phone usage by feeding your virtual dog named Focus with donuts. Earn coins and XP for each feeding.
3) Track your time and progress with beautiful statistics to help with time management and reduce screen time.
4) Unlock new donut recipes, donut machines, and app backgrounds by leveling up and competing with friends.
5) Gift your gems as a donation to help real dogs from shelters while you compete with others.
6) Level up your focus and beat phone addiction while using our Pomodoro timer.

Do you struggle with phone addiction and distractions? Our productivity app is here to help! With our Pomodoro timer, you can focus on your important tasks while building healthy habits. The app's donut machine allows you to produce donuts for your virtual dog, Focus, who needs to be fed regularly. 

But beware of distractions! If you leave the app, your donut machine will stop. The sense of achievement and responsibility for Focus will motivate you to stay away from your phone and get more things done. Your progress is displayed with detailed statistics that help with time management and reduce screen time.

Focus Dog is heavily gamified, making it motivating and competitive. You can customize the app to unlock new donut recipes and upgrade your donut machine, as well as level up and compete with friends. The design is super cute and packed with a ton of details to keep you engaged.

Our app is perfect for those who need to stay focused in various settings, such as in the office, at school, during meditation, or at bedtime. Don't just take our word for it - users love our app! One satisfied customer said, "This productivity/game app is something truly unique. It helps you to keep the focus on the important stuff in your life and battles your phone addiction!" Start your productivity journey with Focus Dog today.

STAY FOCUSED
• Beat phone addiction and overcome distraction in a fun way!
• Turn your focus time into game progress. With every moment of focus, you earn rewards and unlock new features.

GET MOTIVATED
• Unlock over 120 donut recipes, machines, dog skins, and backgrounds as you progress in the game.
• Share your progress and compete with friends and users around the world. 
• Complete challenges and earn extra rewards to keep you motivated.
• Help real dogs in need and make a difference. You can gift your gems as a donation to feed real dogs in shelters.

STATISTICS
• Manage your own tags and view detailed statistics of your time distribution. See how much time you spent on work, study, or relaxation.
• Browse your weekly, monthly, and even your yearly focus time. 

FOCUS DOG PRO
Install Focus Dog for free and use its basic functionalities as long as you want. Subscribe at any time to Focus Dog Pro using the in-app purchase. Focus Dog Pro is available as a monthly subscription or as a one-time purchase. Payment will be charged to App Store Account at confirmation of purchase. Focus Dog will automatically charge your App Store Account at the end of your subscription unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of your current period.

You can turn off auto-renew at any time in your App Store Account Settings after purchase and still receive full functionality until the end of your current period, but we can't refund unused portions of the subscription. In-app purchases and subscriptions cannot be shared using Family Sharing.

Terms of use: https://focusdog.app/terms/
Privacy policy: https://focusdog.app/privacy/

CONNECT WITH US
• Twitter: https://twitter.com/FocusDogApp
• Support: https://donutdog.freshdesk.com

raw_data.releaseNotes:
This update includes a new community donation goal and small fixes.

Thank you Hannah for feedback and bug reports.

Stay safe and productive! *woof*

Best and greetings from Berlin,
Patrick

You can turn off auto-renew at any time in your App Store Account Settings after purchase and still receive full functionality until the end of your current period, but we can't refund unused portions of the subscription. In-app purchases and subscriptions cannot be shared using Family Sharing.

apps.title: Notebook - Take notes with AI
apps.description:
Bring ideas to life with Notebook. Write notes, add files, create to-dos, sketch ideas, record audio, capture moments and more using Notebook. Notebook instantly syncs across your devices and to the cloud.

The simple, intimate joy of Notebook comes from using the app. 

NOTES, TO-DOS, FILES
- Write notes. Start with text, add images and sketches, checklists or audio, all in the same note
- Add PDFs, word documents, spreadsheets, and more with the dedicated file note card
- Create and mark checklists to get stuff done with the dedicated checklist note card
- Record ideas, meetings, and lectures with the audio note card
- Capture moments using the dedicated photo note card
- Scan business cards, documents, and more
- Film your thoughts, lectures, and more using video note card
- Handwrite your thoughts using Apple Pencil

BOOKMARKS
- Collect and archive the latest news, magazine articles, videos, recipes, how-tos, and any other online content from various publishers
- Read articles offline and without Ads
- See Notebook intelligently formats bookmarks into beautiful, distinct cards called Smart Cards

NOTEBOARDS
- Organize your thoughts in kanban style visual and intuitive boards
- Share and collaborate on boards to manage work, projects, and to-dos

NESTED COLLECTIONS
- Group related notes together in a nested hierarchy for better organization.
- Easily navigate between collections and sub-collections to find your notes.

VIDEO CARD
- Capture your thoughts with the video card.
- Record both the screen and yourself simultaneously to stay on top of things.
- Add chapters to your longer videos for easier navigation.
- Publish and share your videos with a public shareable link.

JOURNALING SUGGESTIONS
- Receive personalized journaling prompts based on your activity.
- Enhance your journaling habit with intelligent suggestions.

SPACES
- Brainstorm your ideas in a collaborative digital canvas
- Collaborate with anyone real time using audio and video calls


TAKE NOTEBOOK ANYWHERE
- Synchronize all your notes and notebooks across devices and to the cloud
- Take notes offline and continue on other device when connected to a network

QUICK SEARCH
- Search your notes within or across notebooks
- Search for objects and text within photos
- Search for text within handwritten notes

COLLABORATE REAL-TIME
- @mention to share and collaborate with your peers, friends and colleagues
- Create Public Notes with shareable links

PERFECT NOTEBOOK FOR iOS
- Text search your audio notes.
- Share notes with friends and colleagues through iMessage
- Use Siri to dictate text and checklist notes and search for photo notes
- Get to your most recent notes from the Notification Bar
- SharePlay your notes with your friends during a call

MORE PRODUCTIVE ON iPAD
- Use Notebook alongside other apps using drag and drop, split view, slide over, multiple windows and stage manager
- Use Apple Pencil to handwrite and sketch your ideas

ON APPLE WATCH
- Record audio notes, scribble to create new, check items off your checklists and create photo notes using Apple Watch
- Use Apple Watch Face complications to quickly record audio

DAY TO DAY NOTEBOOK
- Stay on top of your things and be reminded about your important things
- Store your favorite recipes and bookmark articles to read at your leisure

NOTEBOOK FOR TEAMS
- Tame your work through Noteboards and Spaces

NOTEBOOK FOR EDUCATION
- Write and submit your assessments on time
- Record lectures and take notes later
- Scan important books

NOTEBOOK PRO
- Get more storage, create long notes and add large files
- Email In to save emails as notes
- Access premium notebook covers
- Set custom recurring reminders for your workflow

Subscription auto-renews unless cancelled, and will be charged via Apple iTunes account. Prices vary by location. You can manage your subscription in account settings after purchase.

Privacy Policy - https://www.zoho.com/privacy.html
Terms of Service - https://www.zoho.com/terms.html

apps.title: atWork Timesheet
apps.description:
Where did the time go? atWork makes it easy to track your working hours, overtime and earnings to help bring your productivity to new levels. Track your tasks and projects to see exactly where your time went. And how much you earned for it. Create a customized timesheet that covers all your timekeeping needs - perfect for freelancers, employees, hourly workers or anyone looking to show time management who’s boss.

So, ready to make your time work for you?
 
:: EASY TO USE ::
• Start and stop the timer for easy time tracking. Do it in the app or talk to Siri
• Log hours worked later if you forget (don’t worry, it happens)
• Watch the timesheet calculator work out your earnings and overtime automatically - magic!
• Assign each time entry to a client, project and task
• Add workplaces to fully automate your time tracking when you arrive or leave a certain location
• Sync to your Apple Watch to track time and add notes on the go
• Track your average earnings per hour
• Keep your data safe with backup to iCloud or manually via email

:: CUSTOMIZABLE ::
• Export your entries to create an easy-to-read timesheet (as CSV for Excel and Numbers or as PDF)
• Customize your timesheet with notes or default breaks
• Track as much or as little detail as you need - from travel costs to payment status
• Set yearly, monthly, weekly or daily earning goals - you can do it!
• Choose which currency your earnings should be shown in

:: FIRST CLASS SUPPORT ::
• Reach out to us on support@atworkapp.com at any time - 24 hours a day, 7 days a week
• Share your thoughts - we read every single review!

See what the atWork community thinks about our time tracking app:

“Been using this app for two years and I love it. So easy to use” - Accountant

“I've tried several time tracker apps in the past and once I installed and used atWork, I ditched them all!” - MMMobile

“This app is precise and so easy to use. Great features, exactly what I needed to keep track of hours and even my pay rate.” - Jenliz05

We’d love to welcome you to the atWork community too! Get the app today and start managing your time like a pro.

Our atWork team is small yet mighty. We work around the clock to help you with everything from general time tracking questions to app support. Write to us on support@atworkapp.com, day or night, and we’ll typically reply within 24 hours.

Looking forward to helping you!
Sergej & Mikhail - Your atWork Team

raw_data.releaseNotes:
TIME ZONE SUPPORT
• Starting with this version, entries will remain in the time zone in which they were created.
• If the current time zone differs from the original time zone of an entry, the original time zone will be shown in the entry, overview, and export file.
• Example: An entry created in New York from 8:00 to 12:00 will later appear in Germany as 8:00-12:00 (GMT-4).

Do you like atWork? Leave us a quick review and recommend us to others — thank you!
Got questions? Email us at support@atworkapp.com or reach out directly through the app.

Our tip: Enable automatic iCloud backup under More > Backup to keep your data safe.

Best regards,  
Sergej and Mikhail
atWork Team

apps.title: Wisey: Deep Focus
apps.description:
Unlock your full potential by enhancing your focus and efficiency! Deep Focus is designed to help you achieve unparalleled productivity by creating the perfect environment for concentration and relaxation. Experience a transformative approach to managing your time and tasks effectively.


FEATURES

• Focus Sounds: immerse yourself in five distinct sound modes to create the perfect auditory environment for any task. Whether you need to concentrate deeply or unwind after a long day, we have the right sound for you.

• App Blocker: say goodbye to distractions by blocking diverting apps on your phone and schedule focused work sessions. This ensures that your attention remains where it matters most — on your tasks.

• Focus Timer: maximize your productivity by setting up focused work sessions followed by short breaks to maintain peak productivity and avoid burnout. This technique helps you maintain energy and concentration levels to accomplish more.


BENEFITS

Boost Your Productivity - experience a significant increase in your productivity levels by minimizing distractions and optimizing your work environment.

Achieve Your Goals - with structured sessions and focus-enhancing sounds, you’ll find it easier to tackle even the most challenging projects.

Enhance Your Well-being - Our relaxing soundscapes not only help you focused but also promote relaxation and mental clarity, creating a balanced approach to productivity.


PRIVATE & SAFE

For the blocking feature, we use Apple's Screen Time API in order to block apps you use. Download Deep Focus and don’t let distractions hold you back anymore!


TERMS, PRIVACY & CONDITIONS

Read more about our terms and conditions here:
Terms of use: https://wisey.app/l/terms-of-use
Privacy policy: https://wisey.app/l/privacy-policy

apps.title: Psychology: Lazy
apps.description:
Do you struggle with laziness or procrastination? 
The Diligent, Steadfast, Tenacious app can help you overcome these challenges and develop more productive habits. 
With tips and recommendations for improving productivity and motivation, setting goals, and managing time and energy, this app can guide you towards greater success and fulfillment. 
You can also create custom plans and track your progress, and stay motivated with inspiring quotes and reminders.

apps.title: Clearstory: Paperless T&M
apps.description:
Clearstory is the construction industry’s only Change Order Communication Tool connecting Subcontractors and General Contractors in a real-time, cloud-based COR network to align on outstanding Change Order Risk. The Clearstory app creates instant, digital T&M tags for Subcontractors and General Contractors, eliminating the need to track out-of-contract work on triplicate carbon-copy paper tickets. View Change Order Requests you’ve sent and received and speed T&M approval and COR processing to reduce risk and improve productivity and cash flow. Plus, Clearstory is broadly integrated to work as a complement to your existing financial and project management software. 

Key Features:

T&M Made Easy: Clearstory helps project partners instantly create, share, track, and resolve digital Time and Material (T&M) tags quickly and easily. 

Better Jobsite Reporting: Ditch triplicate carbon copy and paper T&M tags forever. Connect with project partners in real-time to eliminate manual workflows and resolve extra work.

Complete Visibility: View Change Order Requests you've sent or received, view and edit project details, and extend or accept invitations to projects from other Clearstory users.

Streamlined Integrations: Create a T&M Tag with an HCSS Time Card and upload photos and files from Autodesk, Egnyte, Procore, and Sharepoint via Agave. Bulk edit labor, materials, equipment, and other fields for T&M.  

Standardized Reporting: General Contractors can instantly standardize T&M and COR reporting from trade partners to reduce risk, improve forecasting, and avoid fee erosion.

Faster Payments: Specialty Contractors can eliminate paper processes, improve jobsite productivity and morale, and get paid faster for out-of-contract work.

Clearstory is engineered by contractors, for contractors. It's the only digital T&M app and Change Order Communication Tool purpose-built to reduce risk for all stakeholders. Join us in making the construction industry a more efficient, productive, and inspiring place to work.

apps.title: Goal Tracker - KUBBO
apps.description:
Goal Tracker - KUBBO helps you beat procrastination by turning goals and tasks into a simple, motivating system. Set clear objectives, create tasks and routines, tap to mark them done, and earn XP as you move forward. Weekly reports and clean stats show where you’re winning and where to improve, so you always know what to do next.

With Goal Tracker - KUBBO, you can:

- Create meaningful goals and break them into actionable tasks
- Build repeating routines and daily habits
- Tap to complete tasks and gain experience points (XP)
- Reschedule single tasks in one tap when plans change
- Set helpful reminders so nothing slips
- Review weekly progress, streaks, and completion rates
- Track profile stats, levels, and productivity trends
- Use a clean to-do list and daily planner for focus
- Link tasks to goals for context and clarity

How it works:
- Create a goal: fitness, study, career, reading, or anything you care about.
- Add tasks or repeating routines and schedule them.
- Complete tasks to earn XP and watch your level grow.
- Check your weekly report to review progress and adjust your plan.
- Reschedule and refine until your system fits your life.

Why it works:
- Clear priorities: Goals give every task a purpose.
- Instant motivation: XP, levels, and streaks make progress visible.
- Consistency over perfection: Routines and reminders keep you on track.
- Honest feedback: Weekly reports and stats help you learn and improve.

Perfect for:
- Students organizing study sessions and revision plans
- Professionals managing projects and daily work
- Creators and freelancers building consistent habits
- Anyone who wants a focused goal tracker to stay productive

What makes Goal Tracker - KUBBO different:
- Gamified productivity that rewards action with XP
- A balance of habit tracker, task manager, and progress tracker
- Fast rescheduling for single tasks without clutter
- Simple design that keeps your attention on doing the next right thing

Core features at a glance:
- Goal tracker with linked tasks
- Habit tracker and routine builder
- To-do list and daily planner
- Smart reminders
- Weekly reports with streaks and completion rates
- Profile stats, levels, and XP
- Quick tap to mark done and quick undo
- One-tap reschedule for single tasks

Use Goal Tracker - KUBBO to stop procrastination, create better habits, and turn plans into consistent results. Whether you need a habit tracker, a task manager, or a progress tracker, you get all three in one place with straightforward tools that help you follow through.

Start now and make daily progress that sticks. Install our Goal Tracker, KUBBO and see how small wins add up to big outcomes.

Use of KUBBO is indefinitely FREE with a limited number of tasks and goals
Terms of use https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

- Accomplish your goals and stay motivated.

apps.title: Microsoft Loop
apps.description:
Think, plan and create together with Loop on the go.

Microsoft Loop is a transformative co-creation experience that brings together teams, content and tasks across your tools and devices. Designed for the way you work, Loop can help you think, plan, and create together.
• Capture ideas, create task lists, and insert photos to your Loop pages to express your thoughts.
• Bring all your project content into a Loop workspace to help your team focus on what matters.
• Comment and react in the app to quickly collaborate on the go.
• Get only the notifications you care about and jump right back into what needs the most attention.
• Edit and share Loop components across Microsoft 365 to help your team be on the same page in one place.

To get started, download Loop, and sign in with your Microsoft Account or the account assigned to you by your work or school.

This app is provided by either Microsoft or a third-party app publisher and is subject to a separate privacy statement and terms and conditions. Data provided through the use of this store and this app may be accessible to Microsoft or the third-party app publisher, as applicable, and transferred to, stored and processed in the United States or any other country where Microsoft or the app publisher and their affiliates or service providers maintain facilities.

Please refer to the End User License Terms for Microsoft Loop. By installing the app, you agree to these terms and conditions.

Privacy terms: https://aka.ms/privacy 

Please refer to the Microsoft Software License Terms, see “License Agreement” under Information. By installing the app, you agree to these terms and conditions.

apps.title: Emmre - Assistant Productivity
apps.description:
Productivity and Communication seamlessly integrated for busy assistants and business leaders.

Winner of the Joan Burge Innovation award celebrating outstanding ideas of executive and administrative assistants.

“Emmre is going to help impact the lives of many executives and assistants.”
- Joan Burge

FOR ASSISTANTS

Whether you’re an Executive Assistant, Virtual Assistant, Administrative Assistant, Support Specialist, Personal Assistant, Office Assistant, Office Manager, Receptionist, or Chief of Staff, Emmre was created for you.

Quickly Convert any Slack message to an Emmre Task

You get hundreds of things thrown at you everyday in Slack. Messages asking you to do this or help with that, flood your feed, leaving you few options to ensure nothing gets missed.

• Mark them all as unread?
• Write them down on a pad of paper?
• Copy and paste the message into your to-do list?

With Emmre, simply click “Convert to task” and you now have the peace of mind that it's on your Emmre task list and won’t get missed.

Emmre will even automatically send a message letting the individual know their message is now on your task list! And when you check it off, it will notify them automatically that it is complete, saving you time and effort and creating a feedback loop your team will love and appreciate.

apps.title: Dawdle AI
apps.description:
Dawdle - Your Anti-Procrastination Sidekick

Meet Pebbles - your cute AI friend that knows way too much about procrastination (like, 100+ research papers worth).

What Dawdle does:
You: "This task is boring."
Pebbles: "Cool, here’s a science-backed trick to make it less awful."
You: "This project feels huge."
Pebbles: "Split it into baby steps. I’ll cheer you on."
You: "I’ll just scroll TikTok instead."
Pebbles: "Not on my watch. Timer’s on. Let’s go."

Why it works:
AI chat with Pebbles -> maps your procrastination reason to the right science-backed fix
Subtask generator -> turns overwhelming projects into tiny wins
Reward picker -> add a treat to keep you motivated
Focus timer + streaks -> stay consistent and see your progress stack

Procrastination sucks. Pebbles doesn’t. Download Dawdle and finally start the thing you’ve been avoiding.

Developed by PhD scientists researching procrastination trained at the University of Michigan Ann Arbor and University of California Santa Barbara.

Break it down - huge projects? Dawdle makes them tiny wins

apps.title: MobiOffice docs & PDF editor
apps.description:
MobiOffice is the smart choice for office productivity. 5 years and 5 million downloads later, we give people the power to create, edit, comment, format, convert, and protect documents, spreadsheets and presentations - as well as the ability to view and sign PDF files. Compatible with Microsoft Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint), Google Docs, Google Sheets, Google Slides, OpenOffice, LibreOffice, WPS Office, Polaris Office, Adobe PDF & more.

General features

• Work with common file types/extensions - .zip, .png, .jpg, .tiff, .mp3, .mov, .mp4, .m4a, OpenDocument & more
• 5GB Free cloud space in MobiDrive available via sign in
• Link your Google Drive, OneDrive, Box or Dropbox accounts to save all your files.
• Scan paper documents to digital ones with your camera
• Unzip archive or create new via the integrated zip functionality

MobiOffice offers you powerful applications packed with helpful tools to handle any task:

MobiDocs
• Microsoft Word office formats - .doc, .docx, .docm + .rtf, .txt.
• Font package with 70+ fonts
• Rich text and paragraph formatting features
• Insert tables, pictures, text boxes, shapes, bookmarks and special symbols
• Create and edit notes, headers & footers, footnotes, page numbers
• Format page setup, page print options, margins, orientation, page size & more


MobiSheets
• Compatible with Microsoft Excel office formats - .XLS, .XLSX, .XLSM + .CSV
• Use 250+ functions or edit formulas
• Create, preview and edit advanced charts
• Filter and sort data or use data validation
• Freeze panes, hide and resize rows & columns


MobiSlides
• Compatible with Microsoft PowerPoint office formats - .PPT, .PPTX, .PPS, .PPSX, .PPTM, .PPSM
• Insert charts, tables, pictures, text boxes & shapes
• Change slide theme, layout, slide size or background
• Presenter mode enables to deliver engaging & interactive presentations
• Add, edit and manage slide transitions


MobiOffice PDF
• Open and annotate PDF files
• Multiple reading options available
• View Table of contents and annotations

Download MobiOffice now and start your free trial.

Our Premium version will give you the possibility to store even more data, with 50GB cloud storage on MobiDrive. Also, you’ll have access to 20+ Premium features, a PDF converter, and the ability to set document passwords to keep your security on point. Other Premium features include:
• Premium MobiDocs - Save as .docs and other different formats, and track changes from multiple authors.

• Premium MobiSheets - Save as .xls, .csv and other different formats, work with conditional formatting, create & edit comments, and insert & edit hyperlinks.

• Premium MobiSlides - Save as .ppt and other different formats, create and edit animations, and add notes to your slides.

• Premium MobiOffice PDF - Convert PDFs to Word, Excel and ePub, work with fillable PDF forms and handwritten signatures with Quick Sign, create and edit annotations and markups - with a night mode that goes easy on the eyes. 

-----
Pricing and subscriptions

MobiOffice offers an auto-renewable yearly subscription for $39.99 per year.

The price corresponds to the same price segment, which is set in the "Apple's App Store Matrix" for other currencies. 

• Your free trial subscription will automatically renew to a paid subscription unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the free trial period.

• Any unused portion of a free trial period (if offered) will be forfeited when you purchase a premium subscription.

• You can cancel a free trial or subscription anytime by turning off auto-renewal through your iTunes account settings, 24 hours before the end of a free trial or subscription period. The cancellation will take effect the day after the last day of the current subscription period, and you will be downgraded to the free service.

Privacy Policy: https://mobisystems.com/privacy-policy

Terms of Use: https://www.mobisystems.com/terms-of-use

raw_data.releaseNotes:
•	Table of Contents in Docs – Now you can automatically generate a Table of Contents for your documents. Get a clear overview of all your sections.
•	Widow/Orphan Control in Docs – Keep paragraphs together, so no single line is left at the top or bottom of a page.
•	Mirrored Margins in Docs – Set margins that flip on facing pages, ideal for double-sided printing.

apps.title: Ivy: Productivity App
apps.description:
Make today yours with Ivy — the lightweight, focused to-do app that creates unstoppable momentum in six simple steps. Plan once, work through your priorities, and end every day with the calm satisfaction of “all done.”
    
What Makes Ivy Shine
- Ivy Lee Method built-in – Utilizing the time-tested Ivy Lee method, add up to six must-do items and complete them one-at-a-time.
- Simple and Elegant – A to-do list without the bloat. Six tasks, big checkmarks. No folders, backlogs, or complicated features. Straight and to the point.
- Streaks & nudges – Keep your momentum alive with streaks and smart reminders that never nag.
- Private by design – Your to-do list lives on your device. No log-in, no data sharing, just you and your goals.
- Stats – Track your productivity with numbers: see your stats, track your productivity, and get better by 1% every day.
    
Join makers, shakers, and high-performing doers who end every day as it should: done.

apps.title: Priorities - for the busiest
apps.description:
"Priorities" is the most effective to-do app you'll ever need. This method is used by famous investors and business people. If they can get by their schedules with this simple method for getting things done, we should be able to do it as well.

See, the productivity novices over-organize their tasks. They label everything, categorize everything, color code everything, mark items as favorites, bookmark, create well-structured folders, keep everything neat and tidy in multiple lists. The result? They never look at those tasks again.

"Priorities" changes that. Every day, you mindfully choose to focus on 3 to 5 most impactful tasks that will help you reach your goals. Then execute like crazy and actually do them.

Repeat this for long enough, you'll become as effective as one can be, and be happy that you didn't procrastinate by organizing tasks.

"Perfection is achieved, not when there is nothing more to add, but when there is nothing left to take away."

apps.title: Production Chain Tycoon
apps.description:
Welcome to Production Chain Tycoon, the idle simulation game that puts you in the role of a CEO managing your industrial empire. In this game, you must use strategy and careful management skills to optimize your supply chain, increase production efficiency, and become the ultimate tycoon. 

At first, start producing essential resources such as wood and stone with a basic production line. You must expand and improve your operations and move on to more complex products such as concrete or plastic. You must carefully manage your resources and logistics to confirm that your assembly line runs smoothly and efficiently, even when idle. 

Manage both supply and demand chains. Carefully balance production with demand to ensure that you are meeting the needs of your factories while also maximizing profits. Take your opportunities to optimize the assembly line to increase productivity and reduce upkeep. As the game progresses, the supply and demand chains become increasingly complex, but as an industrial tycoon, you are not afraid of such insignificant setbacks.

Another important aspect of the game is resource management. You must oversee the progress of your resource mining operations and make strategic decisions about allocating your resources to support your production efforts. This will involve managing logistics and inventory to ensure you have the materials you need to keep your factories running smoothly.

Key features:
- Manage an industrial empire
- Optimize supply chain and increase production efficiency
- Balance production with demand
- Research and develop new technologies
- Play offline, even without an internet connection

In short, Production Chain Tycoon is an awesome idle sim game with endless hours of strategic gameplay. It’s got a ton of focus on supply chain management, resource management, and technology development. If you are up to building your own industrial empire, give Production Chain Tycoon a shot!

- Play offline, even without an internet connection

In short, Production Chain Tycoon is an awesome idle sim game with endless hours of strategic gameplay. It’s got a ton of focus on supply chain management, resource management, and technology development. If you are up to building your own industrial empire, give Production Chain Tycoon a shot!

apps.title: Resultivity - Daily Motivation
apps.description:
Do you want to have a better control over your time? Or maybe you want to free up a few hours for your hobby? Then Resultivity is a tool for you!

Resultivity saves your time by:
- reducing distraction;
- helping you to complete your tasks faster;

Overall, Resultivity brings gamification into everyday work or study. Positive, game-like routine makes it easier to battle through mundane or difficult moments of work or study.

Resultivity works like a regular game where you score points and the difficulty level gradually increases. New levels unlock more productivity patterns or tricks. 

Points system provides a convenient reference point throughout the day. Like in fitness, you can simply look at the number of steps per day - 10k or more – boom, it’s a great day, a small victory. In the same way, in Resultivity – if you score 1000 points per day – it is a productive day! Just a few of these days per week guarantees hitting your productivity goals for a whole week.

Many people focus too much on the destination, when instead, they should be focusing on system of habits in place to get them there. 
 
“We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act but a habit” (с) not Aristotle :) 

We believe, that with the right habits, your goals practically take care of themselves.

Therefore, Resultivity offers you a system of 5 steps:
1. Answer the QUESTION - how productive you are right now?
2. Take control of lost, “wasted” time
3. Make one step at a time
4. Track your priorities
5. Crush your To-Do list
(FREE integration with Microsoft To-Do, Google Tasks and Todoist)

We hope you will enjoy the Resultivity – a digital assistant, who never gets tired and is always ready to help you to live the day to the fullest.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
- Todoist integration fix
- sync improvements
- login using Safari control

apps.description:
Access your data from anywhere. Get notifications, annotate and share, and dive deep into your data with powerful features for decision making on the go. 
 
Highlights: 
 
• View all your important data in one place 
 
• Tap to explore, filter, and focus on what’s most important 
  
• Easily annotate and share reports and visualizations  
  
• Set data alerts and get real-time notifications  
 
• Ask questions in your own words and get meaningful insights into your data with the Q&A virtual analyst 
 
• Securely access your on-premises data 
  
• Scan barcodes and QR codes to easily track inventory and get real-world data in context 
 
• Start exploring your Power BI data instantly, with no setup needed

apps.title: Productivity Wizard
apps.description:
Productivity Wizard - the ultimate tool for maximizing efficiency and tracking performance like never before! With Productivity Wizard, you're not just managing tasks; you're orchestrating success.

Craft and customize any productivity indicator you can imagine, from dollars per hour to downloads per dollar, and everything in between. Whether you're measuring output per investment or pieces produced per dollar spent, Productivity Wizard empowers you to tailor your metrics to suit your unique needs.

But that's just the beginning. Dive into a world of data visualization and insight with our intuitive interface, where you can instantly visualize current values and track the evolutionary journey of your metrics through dynamic graphs and charts.

And the best part? Productivity Wizard is continuously evolving, with exciting new features on the horizon. Stay tuned for updates that will further enhance your productivity journey and unlock even more possibilities for success.

Don't settle for ordinary productivity tools when you can wield the power of the Productivity Wizard. Transform the way you work, measure, and achieve with the app that puts the magic in productivity.

apps.title: Peak-Productivity
apps.description:
The Peak Productivity App gives you Valuable Tools and Resources to take your Productivity to the Next Level.
Our Quizzes will help you diagnose your Skill Gaps and our Ebook and FREE Courses will assist you to fill those Gaps.

Benefits of being highly productive

1. You enjoy time savings and have more time for leisure despite getting more work done.
2. Cost savings are also accrued when you’re doing more in a shorter time.
3. Your progress in your career/business is accelerated because you’re unstoppable. You achieve your goals faster and can set new ones to take you to the next level.
4. It prevents burnout. If a task that usually takes you 7 days to complete is done in 4 days because you’re more productive now – that means you’ll have more time for yourself                           instead of dragging your feet at work.
5. Productivity boosts your morale. You’ll feel a sense of accomplishment and will be motivated to do more when you see that you’re getting the job done – quickly and efficiently.
6. Productivity also improves customer service because you’ll have more freedom to attend to their needs in a timely manner.
7. It increases your competitiveness in the marketplace. By doing more and achieving more, you’ll be a force to be reckoned with.

So, use this App to identify your Skill Gaps with our built in Quizzes, and learn the essential Skills on How to be more productive with our Ebook and Courses.
This App was developed to make you more Productive and help you reach your desired Goals Faster.

apps.title: Homebase: Team Management
apps.description:
Homebase helps small businesses manage their work schedules, time clocks, payroll, HR, and more. Managers who use Homebase save their team 5+ hours a week. Join now and see why 100,000+ small businesses trust Homebase to conquer their workday. Attendance tracking, clock in and out, manage labor costs, and utilize our sales tracker- all with Homebase. 

Manage multiple teams or departments, quickly build, edit, and share schedules. Clock in and out directly from your phone. Payroll app capabilities help to manage your team on the go. Send messages to individual employees or the whole team with our built-in Homebase messaging. Check sales, scheduled labor costs, and labor as a percentage of sales with our tools for time management.

Scheduling shifts is no longer chaotic with Homebase. Timesheets help you build, share, and automate work schedules based on labor costs, sales forecasts, and team availability. Schedule shifts and notify your team when you update the schedule through in-app or email alerts. Time off requests, track hours, trade shifts, and update their availability with our business scheduling.

Top-rated app built for small businesses:
Best Time Clock 2023 - The Motley Fool
Best Scheduling 2023 - Investopedia
Best HR & Employee App 2023 - The Webby Awards
Best Payroll for Hourly Teams 2024 - USA Today
Best Payroll for Small Business 2024 - CNN Underscored

Best employee communication tool ever! - Theresa Fouquette, Owner, Bliss Small Batch Creamery

Schedule shifts, streamline payroll, HR, hiring, team performance, and create timesheets, and track team attendance—all in one place. Homebase is the payroll app that allows for top-tier business scheduling and management. . Download Homebase today, and start tracking.

HOMEBASE FEATURES

PAYCHECK & PAYROLL APP
- Payroll app management made simple with automated calculations with our paycheck app
- In a few clicks, generate timesheets with our payroll app
- Time sheets and paycheck processing is streamlined with in-app clock-in & clock-out
- Payroll app that works with providers like Gusto, Intuit Quickbooks Online Payroll, or Square Payroll app

BUSINESS SCHEDULING AND SHIFT MANAGEMENT
- Use templates to quickly build & share schedules
- Send shift reminders
-  Use an employee availability tracker
- Manage time-off requests

TIME MANAGEMENT AND ATTENDANCE TRACKING
- See hours, breaks, overtime, clock-in, and clock-out time- all with business scheduling
- Get alerts when employees are late or approaching overtime in their shifts.
- Clock in with top POS systems like Clover, Square, Toast, & more

TEAM ATTENDANCE AND EMPLOYEE TOOLS
- Payroll app capabilities that make wages seamless
- Clock in and out directly with Homebase management tools
- Schedule shifts, see shift notes, expected earnings, & team attendance
- Request & accept shift trades
- Time-off requests & updated availability for business scheduling

TEAM COMMUNICATION
- Create group chats & connect with the team in real-time
- Message employees & coworkers across your company

Get support via phone, email, & chat.

Homebase Plans
- Free basic plan for up to 20 employees
- Essentials plan for $24.49/mo with advanced scheduling
- Plus plan for $59.99/mo with hiring & PTO
- All-in-one plan for $99.95/mo with onboarding & HR
- Payroll, Tip Manager, Task Manager, Background Checks, & more available as add-on

In-app upgrades: You can subscribe to a paid plan for additional features. The Account charges the payment upon confirmation of purchase. Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. Auto-renewal may be disabled at any time by going to your settings after purchase. For more information, see the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.

Terms of use: https://app.joinhomebase.com/terms
Privacy policy: https://app.joinhomebase.com/privacy

apps.title: Goal: Habits & Tasks
apps.description:
"I'll start working out on Monday", "I'll definitely quit smoking tomorrow", "I won't forget to buy something at the store" - sounds familiar?
Now "Goal" will help you!
Easily track your habits and tasks with an intuitive interface and thoughtful design.
Focus on what matters most — your goals.

Key Features:
Planning: create daily habits and one-time tasks — all in one app
Smart progress tracking: made easy with an intuitive interface, interactive widgets, and Siri integration
Community: share your successes, get advice, and find inspiration in other users' stories
Personal AI coach: artificial intelligence analyzes your progress and provides personalized recommendations to help you achieve better results
Smart reminders and daily summary: the app will timely remind you of your promises to yourself, whether it's giving up sweets or daily meditation
Detailed analytics: track your progress with comprehensive statistics for all habits and tasks
Cloud sync: automatic synchronization of all your progress through iCloud ensures your achievements are safe

Goal: Habits & Tasks is available with an optional auto-renewing subscription.
You can purchase the subscription through an in-app purchase.
The subscription allows you to add an unlimited number of habits and tasks, while other features of the free version remain unrestricted.
Your subscription will be automatically charged at the end of each month unless you disable auto-renewal at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.
The current subscription cannot be canceled during the active period, but you can disable it in your iTunes account settings.

User Agreement
https://link-goal.web.app/license-agreement.html

Privacy Policy
https://link-goal.web.app/privacy-policy.html

apps.title: Notta Transcribe Voice to Text
apps.description:
Notta: Your AI-Powered Notetaker for Smarter Workflows
Notta is an intelligent AI notetaking assistant that seamlessly transforms speech into text with outstanding precision and speed. Say goodbye to manual transcription—Notta simplifies the process, helping you effortlessly capture meeting minutes, interview insights, and important AI notes in real time.
Focus on the Conversation, Not the Notes—Let Notta Handle the Rest!

Key Features
- 98.86% transcription accuracy
- AI-powered summarization feature for instant insight
- Supports transcription in 58 languages
- Translate text into 42 languages
- Compatible with various file formats
- AI removes noise and delivers clear, high-quality audio
- Auto-sync across multiple devices
Who is Notta for?
- Salespeople and consultants managing frequent meetings or negotiations
- Remote workers, telecommuters, and those working from home
- Media professionals like journalists, writers, interviewers, and bloggers
- Multilingual speakers or students learning new languages

-Security Certifications

Notta obtained the SOC 2 Type II certification, and received ISO/IEC 27001:2013 certification for its information security management system, reinforcing the reliability and security of our services.

-Real-Time Transcription and Summarization

Start transcription with a single click on your PC, smartphone, or tablet. Notta converts spoken words into text in real-time, letting you focus on the conversation instead of taking notes. The AI summarization feature quickly extracts key points from meetings, lectures, and interviews.

- Integration with Hardware

By pairing with devices like Notta Memo or Zenchord, you can save and summarize audio recordings from various scenarios such as business meetings, interviews, and lectures directly to Notta. Notta Memo can also record audio independently, and once connected to the Notta app later, the recordings are automatically transferred.

-Multiple Transcription Options

Notta supports both live transcription and automatic transcription of pre-recorded files. Import audio or video files, and get a one-hour recording transcribed in about five minutes.

-Streamlined Editing Experience

Add bookmarks during transcription to mark important statements, making post-meeting edits faster and more efficient. Searching through recordings is effortless—simply enter keywords to locate specific segments.

-Easily Share Transcription Data

Save transcribed text in formats such as txt, docx, excel, pdf, or srt (subtitles). Export transcriptions with recorded timestamps and timelines, or share them via a link with colleagues and friends.

-Automatic Translation for Global Meetings

Notta supports 58 languages for transcription and can translate text into 42 languages instantly. This feature is ideal for international meetings, helping users understand unfamiliar terms and even improve language skills.

Plans and Pricing
Free Plan
- Real-time transcription: 3 minutes per recording
- Auto-transcription of web meetings (Zoom, Microsoft Teams, Google Meet, Webex): 3 minutes per session
- Import audio files and view the first 3 minutes of transcription for free
- Dictionary: Add up to 3 custom terms
Premium Plan
- 1,800 minutes of transcription per month
- Real-time transcription
- Import audio and video files
- Auto-transcription for web meetings (Zoom, Microsoft Teams, Google Meet, Webex)
- Export transcription data
- Dictionary: Add up to 200 custom terms
- Translate transcription into 42 languages
- Auto-proofreading
- Hide time markers
- Speed up audio playback
- Edit speaker names
- Unlock advanced features and enjoy extensive transcription capabilities.
With Notta, streamline your workflow and elevate your productivity!
Notta Terms of Service:https://www.notta.ai/en/terms
Privacy Policy: https://www.notta.ai/en/privacy
If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us at support@notta.ai.

raw_data.releaseNotes: New: You can now regenerate your AI Notes! Try different templates to find the best summary and get even better results.

- Remote workers, telecommuters, and those working from home
- Media professionals like journalists, writers, interviewers, and bloggers
- Multilingual speakers or students learning new languages

-Security Certifications

Notta obtained the SOC 2 Type II certification, and received ISO/IEC 27001:2013 certification for its information security management system, reinforcing the reliability and security of our services.

-Real-Time Transcription and Summarization

Start transcription with a single click on your PC, smartphone, or tablet. Notta converts spoken words into text in real-time, letting you focus on the conversation instead of taking notes. The AI summarization feature quickly extracts key points from meetings, lectures, and interviews.

- Integration with Hardware

By pairing with devices like Notta Memo or Zenchord, you can save and summarize audio recordings from various scenarios such as business meetings, interviews, and lectures directly to Notta. Notta Memo can also record audio independently, and once connected to the Notta app later, the recordings are automatically transferred.

-Multiple Transcription Options

Notta supports both live transcription and automatic transcription of pre-recorded files. Import audio or video files, and get a one-hour recording transcribed in about five minutes.

-Streamlined Editing Experience

Add bookmarks during transcription to mark important statements, making post-meeting edits faster and more efficient. Searching through recordings is effortless—simply enter keywords to locate specific segments.

-Easily Share Transcription Data

Save transcribed text in formats such as txt, docx, excel, pdf, or srt (subtitles). Export transcriptions with recorded timestamps and timelines, or share them via a link with colleagues and friends.

-Automatic Translation for Global Meetings

Notta supports 58 languages for transcription and can translate text into 42 languages instantly. This feature is ideal for international meetings, helping users understand unfamiliar terms and even improve language skills.

Plans and Pricing
Free Plan
- Real-time transcription: 3 minutes per recording
- Auto-transcription of web meetings (Zoom, Microsoft Teams, Google Meet, Webex): 3 minutes per session
- Import audio files and view the first 3 minutes of transcription for free
- Dictionary: Add up to 3 custom terms
Premium Plan
- 1,800 minutes of transcription per month
- Real-time transcription
- Import audio and video files
- Auto-transcription for web meetings (Zoom, Microsoft Teams, Google Meet, Webex)
- Export transcription data
- Dictionary: Add up to 200 custom terms
- Translate transcription into 42 languages
- Auto-proofreading
- Hide time markers
- Speed up audio playback
- Edit speaker names
- Unlock advanced features and enjoy extensive transcription capabilities.
With Notta, streamline your workflow and elevate your productivity!
Notta Terms of Service:https://www.notta.ai/en/terms
Privacy Policy: https://www.notta.ai/en/privacy
If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us at support@notta.ai.

apps.title: Bubble Productivity
apps.description:
Bubble: Focus Made Simple

Bubble is your personal focus assistant—made for anyone who struggles to stay on task in a world full of distractions. Designed to pair with the Bubble device, this app helps you block apps and silence notifications automatically when you enter your workspace, so you can get more done with less effort.

Whether you're a student prepping for finals, a remote worker trying to stay on track, or a parent setting up a distraction-free zone for your child, Bubble transforms your physical space into a powerful productivity zone.

Key Features:
Automatic Focus Mode
When you're near your Bubble device, the app blocks distracting apps and notifications instantly—no manual toggling needed.

Custom App Blocking
Choose to block entire categories like social media, or select specific apps that pull your attention. You’re in control.

Smart Notifications Pause
Bubble silences notifications from selected apps during focus time and delivers them when you’re done.

Visual Cues & Reminders
Attempting to open a blocked app? You’ll be gently reminded that it’s time to focus.

On/Off Flexibility
Turn off your Bubble anytime, giving you freedom to control when focus mode starts and stops.

How It Works:
- Place the Bubble device wherever you want to focus.

- Pair it with the app via a quick QR scan.

- Select the apps and notifications you want to block.

- Now anytime you walk into your focus zone—Bubble does the rest. You can leave or turn off your Bubble device to return to normal use whenever you decide you're done being productive

Bubble isn’t just another screen time app—it’s a physical and digital solution working together to help you build healthier focus habits. With no subscription required and a one-time purchase of the affordable Bubble device, productivity is finally accessible and sustainable.

Build a better workspace. Build a better mindset.

Download Bubble and start reclaiming your focus!

apps.title: Griply: Goals Planner Tracker
apps.description:
Meet Griply, your ultimate companion for achieving your goals.

Griply brings together all your goals, habits, daily tasks, and life vision into one easy-to-use platform designed to help you succeed.

Whether you're striving to start your own business, pursue personal growth, achieve health and fitness goals, or manage financial goals, Griply offers the tools and motivation you need.

TRACK AND SET ALL YOUR GOALS
• Create SMART goals: Specific, Measurable, Achievable, Relevant, and Time-bound. 
• Track your progress with detailed charts and graphs. 
• Break down long-term goals into manageable subgoals, tasks, and habits. 
• Use advanced targets to measure progress in various ways, such as tasks, subgoals, financial amounts, percentages, weight, distance, and custom metrics. 
• Visualize your goals by adding pictures. 
• Add deadlines and reminders to stay on track. 
• Manage goals across different life areas: Career, Sport & Health, Finances, Personal Development, Relationships, Recreation, and more.

ALL-IN-ONE PRODUCTIVITY PLATFORM 
• Griply simplifies your productivity routine by putting everything in one place. 
• Manage daily tasks alongside long-term goals without switching between apps. 
• Connect your life vision to your goals, habits, and tasks.

PERSONAL DEVELOPMENT
• Wheel of Life: Rank your satisfaction in every area of your life and evaluate what makes you happy. 
• Create a life vision for your ideal future. Describe what succes looks like and add images to visualize.

TRACK YOUR GOALS FROM EVERYWHERE
• Sync your goals and tasks seamlessly across all your devices. 
• Griply is available on iOS, Mac OS, Windows, and in the browser (on your iPad).

REMINDERS & WIDGETS - NEVER MISS A THING
• Stay on top of your progress with custom reminders for goals, tasks, and habits.
• Set up to do, habit and goal widgets on your iPhone home screen to keep your goals top of mind

PRIVACY - YOUR LIFE. YOUR DATA.
• Your personal information is completely secure with Griply. Your privacy is our top priority. 
• Your personal data will not be shared with third parties.
• Lock the app with Face ID or Touch ID for added security.

--

Griply is free to use. For an even more enhanced experience, upgrade to Griply Premium with our optional subscription plan:
• Unlock unlimited goals (2 for free users)
• Add unlimited subgoals (0 for free users)
• Create unlimited habits (2 for free users)
• Personalize your goals by adding your own images
• Custom icons for habits
• Add your own life areas

Griply Pro can be easily purchased within the app, either as a monthly or annual subscription.

*About Pro plan billing*: If you choose to upgrade to the Pro plan, payment will be charged to your iTunes account, and your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours before the current period ends. You can choose between monthly or yearly billing cycles. Additionally, you can turn off auto-renew in your Apple ID Account Settings anytime after purchase.

Read the privacy policy here: https://griply.app/privacy-policy/
Read the terms and conditions here: https://griply.app/eula/

For questions, feedback, or tips, we're happy to help you. Contact us at support@griply.app.

Connect with us:
Instagram: @Griply.App
LinkedIn: @Griply

raw_data.releaseNotes:
LIQUID GLASS INTERFACE
Griply now features Liquid Glass elements throughout the app, giving everything a lighter, more fluid, and modern feel. Buttons, panels, and backgrounds blend naturally with your content, creating a sense of depth and calm focus while keeping the interface beautifully clear and distraction-free.

MORE IN THE COMING WEEKS
Most of the app now supports Liquid Glass. We’ll continue adding more of these elements in the coming weeks while delivering new features and improvements.

apps.title: Wasted Time
apps.description:
Wasted Time, the ultimate meeting productivity companion for all your Apple devices.

Tired of colleagues or friends showing up late to meetings? This innovative app calculates the true cost of tardiness, making it a real-world motivator.

Imagine being able to make the last person to join cover the tab at your next night out... every time! It's a fun and effective way to encourage punctuality and get everyone on the same page.

With Wasted Time, you'll have access to:

* **Cross-platform sync**: Seamlessly track meeting productivity across macOS, iOS, and tvOS devices
* **Meeting tracker**: Track the growing cost as each person joins, with real-time updates


**Get Wasted Time today and:**

* Boost meeting productivity
* Encourage punctuality and accountability
* Have fun with a unique twist on old habits

**Perfect for:**

* Business teams looking to streamline meetings
* Event planners wanting to ensure timely arrival
* Friends and colleagues seeking a lighthearted way to encourage punctuality

apps.title: Process - Log hours worked
apps.description:
1. Figure out the amount of work required to achieve your goal. 2. Create your process. 3. Forget about the results, focus on doing the process over and over. Eventually you're going to get the results. 

* All in one screen design
* Today Widget allows you to quickly view your progress
* 3D Touch support for the fastest way of adding your progress
* Support for all Apple Watch Complications, to always keep an eye on where are you at
* Apple Watch app allows you to add and check your progress on your wrist
* Intelegent notifications

The best way to achieve your goals is to create process and follow it.

If you keep on doing the process, you're going to eventually get the results. 

But if you keep focusing on results then you are never gonna get there, you are gonna be upset, angry and frustrated.

You don't aim for what you wanna get. Instead you need to figure out the process to get what you want, and you do the process over and over again. 

Don't worry about the results, focus on doing the process over and over.

Don't worry about the perfect results, just worry about doing what you have to do.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
Added support for :

- iOS 12, watchOS 5
- Apple Watch Series 4, and all new complications 
- iPhone Xs, iPhone Xs Max

apps.title: Weekly Planner - Diary, Notes
apps.description:
Get organized with our simple Weekly Planner. Plan your life a week at a time and turn the page to schedule the following week. Add appointments, to-do lists, tasks, and recurring events. Miss the ease of paper planners and calendars? You’ll love this digital version.

We created Weekly Planner - Diary, Notes for people frustrated by visiting multiple screens to write down an appointment or task. It’s for individuals who don’t have the time or want to add endless details about each task or appointment. They need an effortless way to see and record to-dos and events.

Open Weekly Planner and you’ll immediately see the current week. You can instantly add items to your Calendar or go to your Notes page with one tap on the Notes icon. When you finish a task, add a check.

Weekly Planner allows you to record events weeks and years in advance. You can also review your past events.

If you prefer a focused, minimalist approach to organizing your life and work, Weekly Planner - Diary, Notes app is for you.

Don’t search for paper refills for your old planner! Learn to use Weekly Planner today and easily track your tasks, appointments, goals, and priorities.

Get started

You can start with a FREE version or with a 7-day free trial of Weekly Planner's PRO version. After 7 days, you can purchase the PRO version for $5.99, if you wish. Use it for a lifetime with no monthly or annual subscription fees. Or use the FREE version as long as you like. The purchase screen will always show you the difference between FREE and PRO.

PRO Features

Optional password lock protection
Synchronize Weekly Planner with iCloud, Google Cloud, and other devices
Save manually or automatically
Save versions for printing in customizable PDFs
Create recurring events happening daily, weekly, monthly, or annually
Create recurring events on exact dates-keep track of birthdays and anniversaries
Search events and entries
Copy, paste, and move entries

Customization options available in PRO settings

Set Sunday, Monday or any other day as the first day of the week
Select a one-day, two-day, four-day, or weekly view
Select from your choice of app icons
Select a page design
Select font size and color

Additional designs are available as in-app purchases.

Contact us for help or support or to share suggestions for improving Weekly Planner at appweeklyplanner@gmail.com.

apps.title: Documents: File Manager & Docs
apps.description:
Documents by Readdle is a super app for iPhone and iPad. It’s your all-in-one solution for working with files at home, in the office, at university, or on the go. Whether you edit, annotate, convert, listen to, or read, Documents brings everything together in one seamless experience. From books, scans, and receipts to articles, PDFs, audio, and video files, and even ZIP & RAR archives — every type of content finds its home in Documents. One app – infinite capabilities. 


Serving as your PDF reader, document viewer, file manager, cloud storage integrator, and music and video player, Documents replaces a dozen standalone apps with one beautifully designed, intuitive hub for all your files. 

Explore a wide range of features designed to help you get things done quickly and efficiently.
PDF EDITOR
• Edit or modify existing text directly in a PDF – just like in a Word document
• Highlight and annotate important info in books using colors, text, or stickers
• Sign PDF contracts on the go with e-signatures
• Merge and combine multiple PDFs into one
• Add, delete, and rearrange pages with a thumbnail preview
• Rotate and reorder pages in PDFs

PDF CONVERTER 
• Easily convert to PDF and vice versa – text, images, photos, etc.

MANAGE AND ARCHIVE FILES & FOLDERS  
• Organize your files and create folders to suit your needs
• Use Reminders by setting a date/time to be notified about a specific file
• Rename and color-tag files for quick access
• Use Smart Actions and get contextual recommendations for the most relevant next step
• Use Zip/Unzip and RAR extractor tools
• Open Office files and eBooks with ease

AI TOOLS 
• Transcribe audio and video to text, then edit, annotate, store in the cloud, or share — all within Documents
• Use Smart Eraser to remove unwanted objects from photos

SCANNER 
• Scan receipts, books, and documents using the built-in iOS scanning engine and save them directly in Documents

AUDIO & VIDEO PLAYER
• Listen to music online and offline
• Watch movies imported from your computer or online sources
• Access your photo and video library easily

AUDIO EDITOR 
• Trim, cut, remove silence, edit metadata, and extract MP3

Wi-Fi FILE TRANSFER 
• Transfer music, videos, photos, or documents from your iPhone or iPad to a Mac or PC and vice versa with our super-fast Wi-Fi Transfer technology

VPN SECURITY & PASSWORD PROTECTION
• Protect your data with built-in VPN encryption
• Add password protection for your files and sensitive information

IMPORT & SAVE FILES
• Import from your computer, cloud, WebDAV, or nearby devices
• Download files from the web browser directly into Documents
• Save email attachments in one place
• Save links from any external app or web browser

INTEGRATE ALL CLOUD SERVICES
• Work in iCloud, Dropbox, Google Drive, and other services without downloading files
• Set up two-way sync to the specific folders to automatically upload your files

SEE WHAT OTHERS HAVE SAID ABOUT OUR APP
Documents is an App Store Editors’ Choice winner.

Read more about our terms and conditions here:
https://readdle.com/privacy
https://readdle.com/documents/terms

raw_data.releaseNotes: Smart Actions are context-aware shortcuts that suggest the best next steps for your files. They now have a cleaner look and faster access. The three most relevant actions are always visible, with the rest just a tap away! We’ve refined flows for single and multiple files and you’ll only see actions that are available for your current file so everything stays predictable. Update now and if you’re enjoying Documents, please leave a positive review on the App Store!

apps.title: Week Plan: Weekly Tasks, Goals
apps.description:
Week Plan is a Task Management app that makes entrepreneurs and teams more effective in their tasks and in achieving their goals. 

Rather than focusing on completing all the tasks and be productive, Week Plan lets you focus on essential tasks. This ensures that you put your best foot on tasks that are in line with your business objectives. 

Inspired by the book, 7 Habits of Highly Effective People by Stephen Covey and OKR (Objective, Key Results) framework, Week Plan is designed to make you and your team more efficient at work.

Trusted by over half a million users, Week Plan has everything you and your team need to plan and achieve your company’s objectives and goals effectively.

Tons of capabilities to make you and your team more effective at work

Objective Key Results

Plan your high impact tasks and objectives using the revolutionary OKR (Objective, Key Results) Framework.

Setup Objectives: Setup and add as many objectives you want to set for each workspace.

Track Key Results: Add and track key results on objectives and monitor you and your team’s progress on them. 

Setup OKR for each team: Add and track separate OKR’s for each team individually.


Task Management 

Add and manage high impact tasks, subtasks and recurring tasks for you and your team. 

High Impact Tasks: Week Plan helps you to integrate all your high impact tasks into your schedule easily.

Add Sub Tasks: Add as many subtasks as you want with their description, deadlines, priority and more. 

Set Repetitive Tasks: Add any recurring task like weekly meetings or reporting once and it will be automatically added to the schedule, whenever you want it to be.





Time Tracking

Setup and Track time took on each task, project, and goal of your entire team.

Track your and your Team’s Time on each Task: Week Plan helps you to get a complete view of each task and subtask of your team.

Track Time across High Impact Tasks & Goals: Tracking the time on high impact tasks and goals helps you to focus and evaluate your time on important tasks and goals.

Pomodoro Timer: Boost time productivity of your entire team by achieving more in short bursts of time using the Pomodoro timer.

Team Task Collaboration

Cultivate team collaboration and let the people do great things together.

Team Tasks and Goals: Create goals for your team and set a twelve-week plan for your projects that you can track weekly. 

Add as Many Team Members You Like: Add and manage all your team members even if you have 10 or 1000 employees in your team.

Easily Share Progress and Deliverables with the Team: Get a central place to share the team progress as well as any deliverables that comes along.
 

Subscription

Week Plan lets you choose between 2 different subscription plans. Each plan comes with a 7 days Free Trial which can be easily extended with 19 more days or 26 days in total by doing basic operations on the app.

Here are the details of the two subscription plans. For both plans there is a 20% discount if annual billing plan is opted.

The changes aim to reduce friction and help you focus more on your planning, with a faster and more pleasant user experience.
raw_data.description:
Week Plan is a Task Management app that makes entrepreneurs and teams more effective in their tasks and in achieving their goals. 

Rather than focusing on completing all the tasks and be productive, Week Plan lets you focus on essential tasks. This ensures that you put your best foot on tasks that are in line with your business objectives. 

Inspired by the book, 7 Habits of Highly Effective People by Stephen Covey and OKR (Objective, Key Results) framework, Week Plan is designed to make you and your team more efficient at work.

Trusted by over half a million users, Week Plan has everything you and your team need to plan and achieve your company’s objectives and goals effectively.

Tons of capabilities to make you and your team more effective at work

Objective Key Results

Plan your high impact tasks and objectives using the revolutionary OKR (Objective, Key Results) Framework.

Setup Objectives: Setup and add as many objectives you want to set for each workspace.

Track Key Results: Add and track key results on objectives and monitor you and your team’s progress on them. 

Setup OKR for each team: Add and track separate OKR’s for each team individually.


Task Management 

Add and manage high impact tasks, subtasks and recurring tasks for you and your team. 

High Impact Tasks: Week Plan helps you to integrate all your high impact tasks into your schedule easily.

Add Sub Tasks: Add as many subtasks as you want with their description, deadlines, priority and more. 

Set Repetitive Tasks: Add any recurring task like weekly meetings or reporting once and it will be automatically added to the schedule, whenever you want it to be.





Time Tracking

Setup and Track time took on each task, project, and goal of your entire team.

Track your and your Team’s Time on each Task: Week Plan helps you to get a complete view of each task and subtask of your team.

Track Time across High Impact Tasks & Goals: Tracking the time on high impact tasks and goals helps you to focus and evaluate your time on important tasks and goals.

Pomodoro Timer: Boost time productivity of your entire team by achieving more in short bursts of time using the Pomodoro timer.

Team Task Collaboration

Cultivate team collaboration and let the people do great things together.

Team Tasks and Goals: Create goals for your team and set a twelve-week plan for your projects that you can track weekly. 

Add as Many Team Members You Like: Add and manage all your team members even if you have 10 or 1000 employees in your team.

Easily Share Progress and Deliverables with the Team: Get a central place to share the team progress as well as any deliverables that comes along.
 

Subscription

Week Plan lets you choose between 2 different subscription plans. Each plan comes with a 7 days Free Trial which can be easily extended with 19 more days or 26 days in total by doing basic operations on the app.

Here are the details of the two subscription plans. For both plans there is a 20% discount if annual billing plan is opted.


1) Pro

Monthly:  $10 / Month
Yearly: $ 104 / Year (billed on $8.67 / month X 12)

2) Ultimate

Monthly: $16.25 / Month
Yearly: $156 / Year (billed on $13 / month X 12)
 
The price is mentioned in US Dollar (USD)
The length of subscription is either monthly or yearly ( depending on the plan selected)

Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal

apps.title: Swann Security
apps.description:
With Swann Security, everything is controllable via this single app.
Swann’s wired security systems, including all of our latest DVR and NVR series, now work seamlessly with wireless solutions such as Swann's new range of Indoor and Outdoor Wi-Fi security cameras. 

A list of products that work with this app can be found here: 
https://www.swann.com/us/apps

Please note that other Swann CCTV and IP camera models will not work with this app. This page will be updated as new compatible products are released.

Note: This app uses a data stream that will connect to your Swann system via 4G/5G or Wi-Fi. When using 4G/5G, the video from your Swann device may be considered "downloads" by your phone service provider and could contribute to any download limit your phone data plan may have. If you exceed any plan limits you may incur additional usage charges. Consult with your mobile service provider regarding the use of a video streaming app and how it may affect your plan. 

For assistance with this app, contact Swann Tech Support – tech@swann.com

Swipe your way to peace of mind
Frido makes planning your day simple and intuitive. Just swipe right to add tasks to your schedule, or swipe left to clear them from sight. It’s never been easier to stay organized.

Need Focus?
Activate Focus Mode to block distractions and stay on track with one task at a time.

Set the Mood
Customize your tasks by setting the mood for each one. This helps Frido understand how to better organize your to-do list and improve your productivity.

Take control with Frido and start accomplishing more today.

Love,
Frido Folks

apps.title: Focus Plant: Forest phone lock
apps.description:
Have a phone addiction? Want to improve self-control? Want to remove distractions? Let Focus Plant help! 

Save barren landscapes by turning your focus time into raindrops and growing adorable plants. Let magical plants help you manage time and stay focused on the most important things in life.

Focus is a gamified focus study timer app to help people better manage their time and focus on the important things in their lives. Sometimes self-discipline is just not enough to keep us away from the phones. This is when gamification comes in, the in-game achievements encourage users to stick with the app, better manage their time, and get things done.


FEATURES:

Beat phone addictions and stay in control

Stay focused - Collect raindrops when you put down the phone and focus

Nurturing plants - Use raindrops to discover/grow adorable plants 

Collection - Unlock and collect hundreds of absolutely adorable plants

Save the world - Clean up trash to bring life back to several magical worlds

Records - Stay on track of the time you focus so that you can better plan your tasks

Rewards - gamified tasks and rewards help you stay on track with your focus goals

HEALTHKIT:

Focus Plant uses HealthKit to read mindfulness data from 3rd party apps including but not limited to Forest, Flora, Plantie, Flipd, Study Bunny, Quality Time, Liquid Text, Emphasis, Flat Tomato, Focus Keeper, Finch, Clickup, Study Buddy, Socratic, Study Blue, SleepTown, Calm, and Headspace. Make sure to grant all permissions when asked to authorize the Health App to make it work.

SUBSCRIPTION PRICING AND TERMS:

SuperPass offers USD $4.99 monthly subscription for accessing exclusive resources and premium features.

End of trial and subscription renewal:
This price is for United States customers. Pricing in other countries may vary and actual charges may be converted to your local currency depending on the country of residence.

Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase.
Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.

Account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal.

Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user’s Account Settings after purchase.

Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable.

Privacy policy: https://site.shikudo.com/privacy-policy
Terms of use: https://site.shikudo.com/terms-of-use
