apps.title: SIGMASMITH
apps.description:
Introducing the latest innovation from Sigmasmith: Efficiency and Productivity Toolkit. Designed for businesses seeking to elevate their operational efficiency and optimize labor management, our app is your gateway to productivity insights.

Maximize Labor Hours with Precision: Our Efficiency Calculator is engineered to deliver precise calculations of your labor hours per unit and labor cost per unit, enabling you to make informed decisions that boost productivity while managing costs effectively. Discover the power of data-driven decision-making and elevate your operational efficiency to new heights.

Prioritize with Pareto: Navigate the complexities of error management with our Error Frequency Tracker. By identifying and prioritizing errors based on Pareto-presented data, our tool empowers you to focus on the most impactful issues. Reduce downtime, minimize errors, and streamline your operations with targeted solutions that make a difference.

Optimize with Time Studies: Elevate your process optimization with our Time Study Tool. Capture comprehensive time studies effortlessly and review the data through intuitive Line Balance Charts. Align your operations with Takt Time (customer demand) and identify the optimal focus areas to enhance throughput, meet demand, and exceed expectations.

Whether you're looking to refine your labor allocation, reduce operational errors, or streamline your production processes, Sigmasmith's app is your all-in-one solution. Embrace the future of operational excellence and join the ranks of businesses transforming their productivity landscapes.

Efficiency Calculator that provides Labor Hours Per Unit and Labor Cost Per Unit.
Error Frequency Tracker that presents recorded error data in a pareto chart for easy prioritization of error reduction.
Time Study to allow multiple time study entries and presented through a line balance chart with takt time.

Download now and take the first step towards operational perfection with Sigmasmith. Your journey to enhanced efficiency and productivity begins here.

apps.title: SimpleList - Tasks & To-Do's
apps.description:
SimpleList - Simple by design

No complicated features. No overwhelming options. Just your tasks, organized with colors that make sense to you.
Colors That Click - Choose from a vibrant palette to color-code your tasks, projects, and categories. Create your own visual system - red for urgent, blue for personal, green for work, or whatever feels right.
Visual Organization - See your entire day at a glance with color-coded tasks that instantly communicate what needs attention. No reading required - the colors tell the story.
Clean & Clear - A minimalist interface that gets out of your way. Add a task, pick a color, and you're done. Task management shouldn't require a manual.
Nest Naturally - Group related tasks under colorful projects and categories. Create visual hierarchies that mirror how you actually think about your work.
Priority at a Glance - Mark tasks as priority and they'll stand out with their colors intact. Filter to see only priorities when you need focus.

Why SimpleList?
Because your brain processes colors faster than text. Because rainbow sticky notes shouldn't require a desk. Because organization should feel satisfying, not stressful.
Perfect for visual thinkers, creative minds, and anyone who believes productivity tools should spark joy, not dread.

SimpleList: Where simplicity meets color.

Download today and make your task list as vibrant as your life.

apps.title: Planner & Journal - Zinnia
apps.description:
Zinnia is the most fun and creative way to keep a digital journal and planner. Enjoy calendars, trackers, stickers and more - with new content added every month. There are a couple of options to get you started: a free version with limited content, or a free 1 week trial with all the bells and whistler. After the trial, subscriptions with full content access are only $34.99/year.

ZINNIA STUDIO
• Zinnia has a custom-curated digital Studio
• Ready-to-use journals • planners •  trackers • stickers • washi tape • journal cards • frames • templates • more
• Themed content collections for easy aesthetic journaling

MONTHLY CONTENT ADDITIONS
• New content added every month 
• New features added frequently

MY STUFF
• Save & organize your handmade designs, or your favorite selections from our Studio

PRODUCTIVITY
• Sync events to your digital calendars like Google Calendar
• Customize your calendar to make sense for your schedule
• Choose from a variety of templates and take control of your habits, goals, and time management
• Practice Timeblocking, Kanban, Pomodoro, SMART goals, and other productivity methods with Zinnia’s templates and design tools

MENTAL HEALTH
• Schedule and stay on top of self-care
• Use color coding, trackers, and other methods to help you focus
• Write about your thoughts & feelings 
• Practice gratitude journaling

FEELS REALISTIC
• Handwrite naturally, just like paper and pen
• Scribble-enabled
• Sketch, doodle, and color with lifelike tools
• Variety of writing instruments
• Adjustable opacity, size, color

DIGITAL PERKS
• Undo
• Resize objects and move them around
• Send to back/front
• Lock a layer in place
• Crop and rotate
• Auto-date templates with custom start date
• …and more!

FEATURED ARTISTS
• Popular artists in the journaling community make exclusive Zinnia collections and share creative inspiration

LINKING
• Add external links to internet pages
• Add internal links to journal pages
• Your linked & tabbed Etsy planners are compatible

IMPORT & NOTETAKING
• Import PDFs and markup (yes, including Etsy journals!)
• Import personal photos 
• Import notes: highlight & annotate (take a pic of your textbook, or import a pdf!)

TUTORIALS & TIPS
• Library of articles w/video tutorials & tips
• Youtube & Instagram channels with tutorials and tips

EASY SHARING
• Share your creations directly to Instagram, Pinterest, Facebook and other social networks 
* Save your spread as a PDF, archive or your method of choice
* Ensure your journal is safe and sound with iCloud syncing

= = = = =

ZINNIA PREMIUM

Use Zinnia Premium for free during the free 7-day trial. After the free trial, you will be automatically renewed to your selected subscription which you can cancel at any time. 

Paid subscriptions cost:
$3.99 USD per week,
$8.99 USD per month, or
$34.99 USD per year.

Prices are subject to change. Zinnia Premium automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period.

Payment will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase. You may manage Zinnia Premium subscriptions and turn off auto-renewal by going to your Account Settings after purchase. Any unused portion of a free trial period will be forfeited when you purchase a Zinnia Premium subscription.

= = = = =

Privacy Policy
http://pixiteapps.com/privacy-policy/

Terms of Use
http://pixiteapps.com/terms-of-use/

raw_data.releaseNotes:
Zinnia 1.42 has our powerful new brush engine. Drawing, handwriting and coloring are now smoother, more responsive, and have a higher resolution. Draw with your finger, or use your Apple Pencil Pro for extra nuance and capabilities.

This newest version also includes bug fixes and performance enhancements for an improved Zinnia experience.

Happy Planning!

apps.title: AiCE
apps.description:
Step into the future with AICE, an app designed to help you grow your business in ways you never thought possible.

At the heart of AICE is our AI assistant. This isn't just a helper; it's like having a network marketing expert with you all the time. It gives you smart advice to help your business grow, built from its deep understanding of the network marketing world.

Managing your contacts has never been easier. AICE organizes all your interactions, making sure you always know who you're talking to and what you discussed. And it doesn't stop there. When you make notes, our AI digs into them, pulling out insights to help you make the right decisions for your business.

Don't worry about forgetting things either. With our tasks feature, you can easily plan out your work. Our rhythms feature lets you set up regular tasks that keep your business running smoothly.

Stay updated with the activity feed. It's a real-time list of what's happening in your business, keeping you informed and ready to act. And when it comes to online, AICE has your back. Our social content generator helps you create engaging posts for your audience. We even have a script generation tool that writes effective messages for you to use.

But remember, this is just the beginning. There's a lot more AICE can do, and we can't wait for you to discover it all. Get started with AICE today and take your network marketing business to the next level. This is the future, and it's here waiting for you.

raw_data.releaseNotes: Multiple fixes related to badge access and post notifications

apps.title: Smart Metronome & Tuner
apps.description:
Smart Metronome turns your iPhone into a simple, stylish and very accurate metronome!

It contains three modes; Normal, Repeat and Program.

*** Normal Mode ***
Start practicing instantly, just like with any basic metronome. Enjoy its beautiful look with realistic
pendulum movement. Smart Metronome also uses natural sounds recorded from real metronomes
and percussions.
One beat can be set into two eighth notes, triplets, or four sixteenth notes. It also has a large Beats
Per Minute (BPM) number display and Italian tempo markings. Just tap the BPM number to set the
tempo. 

*“** Repeat Mode ***
This is an indispensable practice tool for difficult passages, scales or arpeggios. You can program
the number of measures to practice with, and Smart Metronome incrementally increases the tempo
automatically with each repetition.

*** Program Mode***
This feature offers detailed control over tempo and time signature changes, You can program
numbers of measures, and tempos sequence. Accelerando and ritardando are also available. The
tempo automatically increases or decreases, according to your program.
Smart Metronome also comes with simple tuning tones that would help those who needs tuning.
Blind or low-vision users, too, can use all the features with voiceover.
Smart Metronome is not just for music. You can use while dancing, exercising, and even golfing;
any activity that needs accurate timing.

Features
• Creates perfect beats by working completely on hardware, without using CPU time
• Sampling rate 44.1kHz sampling rate, resulting in high accuracy (±20µs)

• Easily set the BPM by tapping
• Programmable Tempo and measures
• Loop multiple measures
• Drum machine
• Tuning meter
• Full voiceover compatibility
• Log can be taken
• Save and load tempo program

• Ten background color variations
• Realistic pendulum animation
• Four sounds sets to choose from

apps.title: B-hyve
apps.description:
The B-hyve smart sprinkler timer app allows you to control or monitor your sprinklers from anywhere in the world with the convenience of your smart device. 
 
Smart Watering
Knowing how long and how often to water your plants can be challenging.  When set to smart watering mode, B-hyve takes the guesswork out of watering and utilizes Mother Nature, along with some really great technology, to determine the watering schedule for your yard.  When set and left in smart watering mode, B-hyve can save users as much as 50% more water over a traditional controller. 

Weather
When set in smart mode, B-hyve uses local weather data to determine how much water is evaporated and transpired through your plants each day to know when it needs to water.  It also accounts for any rainfall that is in the forecast, shuts off the system for rain, then looks back to see how much actually fell.  That’s smart!  But all yards are not the same.  B-hyve also takes into account things like soil type, plant type, sun/shade and slope to determine a watering schedule that takes the water to the roots and helps avoid runoff. 

WeatherSense
If you want to be the one in control of the schedule, that’s okay too.  With B-hyve you can set custom programs to water how you want while still taking advantage of the local weather data to override watering in case of a weather event.  This will shut off your system during the rain and resume your program when the rain has passed.  That’s smart!

Integrated Irrigation Audit Tool
The B-hyve app also integrates the award-winning irrigation audit tool right to your smart device.  By performing a catch cup test on your sprinkler system, you will know exactly how much water is being applied rather than relying on estimated sprinkler head water use that other timers/apps use, which can be off by as much as 50%, saving you more water and money.   

This is the app for the best-selling, WaterSense and SWAT certified Orbit B-hyve Smart Wifi Sprinkler Timer.  This is also the companion app for homeowners with the Hydro-Rain B-hyve Pro Wifi Controller. 
Please let us know if you have questions or problems.

ALEXA – Works with Alexa.  For a list of Alexa commands visit http://help.orbitbhyve.com/Alexa-Commands/

Bhyve.orbitonline.com
800-488-6156
support@orbitbhyve.com

apps.title: Satchi: Productivity partner
apps.description:
Meet Satchi – Your Productivity Ally

Satchi is a minimal, intelligent assistant designed to help you plan better, act with purpose, and grow every week. Combining powerful research-backed strategies with natural language interaction and elegant design, Satchi makes productivity feel intuitive, not overwhelming.

Key Features:

Inbox
Quickly capture ideas, tasks, or thoughts. Offload your mind into your second brain and sort things out when you're ready.

Task Timeline
Visualize your day with time-blocked clarity. One-time, recurring, and habit-based tasks – all in one unified view.

Habit Loops
Build or break habits using the proven cue–routine–reward model. Stay consistent, and watch change compound.

Tags
Organize tasks and habits with custom tags. Analyze focus areas and stay aligned with your goals.

Execution Tracking (Optional)
Compare your planned schedule with what actually happened. Learn where time leaks and optimize for focus.

Natural Language Chat
Create or edit tasks, manage habits, or just ask for help – all through a smart conversational interface.

Daily and Weekly Insights
Beyond task completion, gain real insights into how you spend time and where you can improve – with a fun productivity persona assigned every week.

Thoughtfully Minimal Design
Satchi is designed to stay out of your way while helping you stay on track – calm, confident, and clutter-free.

Whether you're dealing with procrastination, managing a packed day, or building high-performance routines, Satchi is your coach, assistant, and partner in progress.

Your journey to mindful productivity begins here.

Find more details here:
FAQ & Support: https://sites.google.com/view/satchiapp-help/home
Privacy Policy: https://sites.google.com/view/satchiapp/home
Terms of Use (EULA): https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

apps.title: Clear: To Dos & Reminders
apps.description:
Over 270 million tasks checked off in Clear. Here's why so many find it uniquely productive:

BEAUTIFULLY MINIMAL
Zero on-screen clutter. Just you and your thoughts, as it should be.

FORM & FUNCTION
Clear's colorful heatmap is stylish and useful, highlighting your most important tasks for triage.

PERSONALIZABLE
Make Clear perfectly yours with color themes, icons, font options and more.

FLUENT GESTURES
Swipe to check off to ascending musical chimes and see why Clear's trademark gestures make it frictionless to dump the clutter in your head into its heat mapped lists.

SIMPLE & FLEXIBLE
There’s a whole world of listing past the iconic daily to-do or grocery list. Anything cluttering your head is likely perfect to store in a tidy list in Clear:

apps.title: BUSY – Advanced Focus Timer
apps.description:
BUSY — Focus Timer & Distraction Blocker

Stay focused. Get more done.
BUSY helps you block distractions and stay on track. Whether you need short breaks or deep focus sessions, BUSY works for you — on your phone and your Apple Watch.

Key Features:
• Start a BUSY Session. Use a simple timer, set up your own Pomodoro-style workflow, or dive in with no time limit. 	•	Timer Themes. Customize your focus with sleek, modern designs that match your vibe.
• Block Distractions. Automatically block distracting apps, mute notifications, and stay in control.
• No “5 More Minutes”. Stay accountable with sessions you can’t skip.
• Track Your Attempts. See how often you try to open blocked apps — and improve over time.
• watchOS Support. Start, stop, or skip your focus timer directly from your Apple Watch. Everything syncs instantly with your phone.

BUSY is designed to help you focus better, block distractions, and get things done — wherever you are.

• Phase Progress: clear visual feedback to keep your session on track.

apps.title: Weekly Timetable: The Schedule
apps.description:
Simplify your academic life with Weekly Timetable, the ultimate planner for students!

To achieve the best results in your college or school life, it is very important to be organised, keep track of all the assignments and classes. This application was created specifically for students who have a schedule with recurring or alternating weeks and automatically displays the schedule for the following weeks. You just fill your schedule once and the application will do the rest for you! 

With a handy widget and Apple Watch support, you do not even need to unlock your device to quickly check the schedule!

With our application you will be able to:
- Organize your class schedule
- Use the widget to view your schedule at a glance
- Track homework and assignments
- Set reminders for classes and due dates
- Share your timetable with friends

Weekly Timetable supports up to 4 repetitive weeks. All you have to do is select the needed amount of repetitive weeks, feel in the schedule for them and select your current week number. From now on Schedule Planner will automatically display correct week on the main screen and repeat it with a selected time period. 

You can easily track all of your assignments within the Weekly Timetable app. You can keep track of already completed task or task that should still be done. You can even attach some photos or create reminders so you will never forget to finish your assignment in time. 

Schedule Planner allows you to share the already filled in timetable with your friends just in a few clicks. You just share newly generated code with friends and they will have your schedule on their devices in less than a minute.

If you have any questions or suggestions on how to improve an app, we will be glad to hear from you! Contact us via our website: https://weeklytimetable.app.

apps.title: PrioriPlanner: Daily TODO List
apps.description:
Take control, boost productivity, and make daily progress effortless!

Struggling with a mountain of tasks and an ever-growing to-do list? Meet PrioriPlanner, the app built to help entrepreneurs, freelancers, students, and anyone juggling a busy schedule stay on track. PrioriPlanner turns chaotic task lists into clear, achievable steps so you can focus on what truly matters, every day.

Why PrioriPlanner?

1. Clarity Amid Chaos
Transform your productivity with PrioriPlanner’s simple yet powerful task organization. Break down large goals into manageable subtasks, ensuring you’re never overwhelmed. PrioriPlanner’s structure helps you see your next steps clearly and stay on track without the stress.

2. Prioritize Like a Pro with the Eisenhower Matrix
Our Eisenhower Matrix feature categorizes tasks by urgency and importance, helping you make smarter decisions about what deserves your attention. Here’s how it works:

	•	Do Now: Handle tasks that need immediate action.
	•	Schedule: Plan tasks for the future, so nothing slips through.
	•	Delegate: Assign tasks to others and free up your focus.
	•	Eliminate: Remove distractions and stay focused on priorities.
	•	Anytime: Reserve these for downtime or extra moments.

This proven prioritization framework saves you time, energy, and keeps you focused on what truly drives progress.

3. Daily Victories, Simplified
No more endless task lists! PrioriPlanner’s smart filtering shows you only what you need to tackle today, making daily progress straightforward and sustainable. Build momentum each day without feeling overwhelmed.

4. Stay on Target with Task Goals
Set achievable daily task goals to keep yourself accountable. PrioriPlanner’s Task Goal feature keeps you progressing without the stress, so you can maintain a steady workflow and celebrate small wins daily.

5. Powerful Task & Subtask Organization
Tackle complex projects by breaking them down into subtasks, making big goals feel doable. PrioriPlanner ensures you can always move forward, even on the most daunting projects.

6. Customize Your Productivity
Sort, filter, and prioritize tasks in the way that works best for you. PrioriPlanner provides flexible filtering options, allowing you to set up the system that complements your unique workflow and lifestyle.

7. Privacy and Security Built-In
Your data stays private and secure, stored locally on your device—your productivity, your privacy.

Packed with Essential Productivity Tools

	•	Pomodoro Focus Timer
Boost focus and efficiency with the Pomodoro technique. PrioriPlanner’s built-in Pomodoro timer helps you maintain attention and get more done in less time.
	•	Recurring Task Support
Set up tasks that repeat daily, weekly, or at intervals you choose. Spend less time planning and more time executing, with PrioriPlanner handling the details of your recurring tasks.

Transform How You Work

Don’t let chaos or disorganization stand in your way. PrioriPlanner gives you the tools to make significant daily progress. From your personal projects to professional goals, PrioriPlanner is your productivity companion.

Subscription Information

Subscriptions will be billed to your iTunes account. Automatic renewals occur unless canceled at least 24 hours before the current period ends. Manage or cancel subscriptions anytime via Application Settings. If eligible for a trial period, the subscription will start after the trial ends unless canceled at least 24 hours before the trial period’s end.

Privacy & Data Policies

For information on data collection, privacy policies, and third-party library use, please see: https://www.prioriplanner.com/privacy-policy
Terms and conditions can be found here: https://www.prioriplanner.com/terms-conditions

By using this app, you agree to the terms and conditions referenced above.

Set achievable daily task goals to keep yourself accountable. PrioriPlanner’s Task Goal feature keeps you progressing without the stress, so you can maintain a steady workflow and celebrate small wins daily.

5. Powerful Task & Subtask Organization
Tackle complex projects by breaking them down into subtasks, making big goals feel doable. PrioriPlanner ensures you can always move forward, even on the most daunting projects.

6. Customize Your Productivity
Sort, filter, and prioritize tasks in the way that works best for you. PrioriPlanner provides flexible filtering options, allowing you to set up the system that complements your unique workflow and lifestyle.

7. Privacy and Security Built-In
Your data stays private and secure, stored locally on your device—your productivity, your privacy.

Packed with Essential Productivity Tools

	•	Pomodoro Focus Timer
Boost focus and efficiency with the Pomodoro technique. PrioriPlanner’s built-in Pomodoro timer helps you maintain attention and get more done in less time.
	•	Recurring Task Support
Set up tasks that repeat daily, weekly, or at intervals you choose. Spend less time planning and more time executing, with PrioriPlanner handling the details of your recurring tasks.

Transform How You Work

Don’t let chaos or disorganization stand in your way. PrioriPlanner gives you the tools to make significant daily progress. From your personal projects to professional goals, PrioriPlanner is your productivity companion.

Subscription Information

Subscriptions will be billed to your iTunes account. Automatic renewals occur unless canceled at least 24 hours before the current period ends. Manage or cancel subscriptions anytime via Application Settings. If eligible for a trial period, the subscription will start after the trial ends unless canceled at least 24 hours before the trial period’s end.

Privacy & Data Policies

For information on data collection, privacy policies, and third-party library use, please see: https://www.prioriplanner.com/privacy-policy
Terms and conditions can be found here: https://www.prioriplanner.com/terms-conditions

By using this app, you agree to the terms and conditions referenced above.

Documents
by SavySoda™


••• Reached #1 overall BUSINESS APP •••
••• on App Store in OVER 40 COUNTRIES. •••
••• Over 30 Million Users on iOS •••
••• AS FEATURED BY APPLE, USA TODAY •••


iPhone's and iPad's lightweight mobile office suite. This essential application allows you to edit and manage spreadsheet & rich text files on your iPhone. Works both online and offline. You can also synchronize files to your Google Drive, Dropbox, Box, and SkyDrive accounts and open files on your PC or Mac.


Works with Dropbox™
Works with Google Drive™
Works with Microsoft OneDrive™


Files can be opened using Microsoft Word and Excel, Open Office, Numbers, and all major office suites.


INCLUDES

• iSpreadsheet (a premier spreadsheet app)
• Text Editor (to edit basic text)
• iPhone file browser (to view iPhone files)
• Google Sync (to upload/download documents)
• Dropbox Integration


FEATURES

• Smooth User Interface
• Portrait & Landscape mode
• Full support for .txt and .csv files
• Limited support for .doc, .docx, .xls, .xlsx files from Google Docs
• Google upload & download
• Files can be opened in Microsoft Excel, Word, Apple Numbers, TextEdit, Notepad, Openoffice & all leading office suites.
• Works anywhere online or offline.
• Spreadsheet supports formulas, formatting, resizing, and all basic spreadsheet features.
• Beautiful UI.


SOME USES

• Lightweight office work on the run
• Backup of documents
• Quick access to spreadsheets, notes, memos
• Basic word processing
• Pocket Spreadsheet


The Documents suite of apps is the ORIGINAL and most popular mobile office and file management solution for the iPhone and iPod. Over 30 million users choose Documents for their everyday business and productivity use. And it's now available for everyone to use for free. There is also an option to upgrade.

iPhone Business Apps:
http://www.savysoda.com

apps.title: Focus Drop: Productivity Timer
apps.description:
Effortlessly stay focused and motivated with Focus Drop's simple Pomodoro app!

Get ready to boost your productivity and stay focused like never before with Focus Drop! Our simple Pomodoro time management app helps you segment your work into productive sessions and relaxing breaks, all while keeping you motivated and minimizing distractions. With its sleek and elegant design, Focus Drop won't distract you from your tasks, so you can concentrate on what's important.

But Focus Drop is more than just a Pomodoro timer - it also includes a range of features to help you stay on track and achieve your goals. Customize your timing to fit your workflow, track your progress with insights from your past activities, and choose from a selection of calming ambient sounds to help you focus. And when you need to get things done without interruptions, activate Focus Drop's DO NOT DISTURB mode to block distractions.

Plus, Focus Drop is fully customizable, with options to track your time in minutes, hours, or sessions, and support for long sessions of up to 3/4/5 hours. And with the added convenience of Dark Mode, you can use Focus Drop in any lighting conditions.

But that's not all - Focus Drop is constantly evolving, with new features on the horizon, like study groups for students to work together even when they're apart. And if you want to take your productivity to the next level, upgrade to our premium plan to remove all ads and interruptions.

Try Focus Drop today and start crushing your goals like never before!

Focus Drop offers a premium plan to remove all ads or interruptions. If you choose to subscribe, you will be charged a subscription fee according to your country. The subscription fee will be shown in the app before you complete the payment. Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase. Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal. Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase. No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during active subscription period.

Terms of Service: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/
Privacy Policy: https://odinstudio.me

Contact us: odinakastudio@gmail.com

raw_data.releaseNotes: We've fixed those bugs and made improvements across the app to help you stay focused.

apps.title: Keeper Password Manager
apps.description:
Keeper Password Manager keeps your passwords and data secure on any device. The Keeper app maximizes your password security and strengthens your password protection, keeping your personal data secure. Utilize our secure password generator, store passkeys and 2fa codes, autofill your passwords anywhere and sync across all of your devices. Keeper is the proven cybersecurity leader that protects millions of people and thousands of companies globally.

Keeper Password Manager lets you create strong, random passwords and passphrases with its built-in password generator, secure them in an encrypted digital vault you can open on any device, and instantly autofill or securely share credentials across all your sites and apps. Save and sync passkeys and 2FA codes right inside Keeper for one-tap login anywhere. Zero-knowledge, AES-256 encryption shields every password and piece of sensitive data from breaches, ransomware, and other cyber-attacks.

Keeper Password Manager stores unlimited passwords, passkeys, 2fa codes, files, and payment cards in a zero-knowledge, AES-256–encrypted digital vault that syncs to every phone, tablet, and computer you use. Unlock your password vault instantly with fingerprint or face ID, then autofill or securely share records with fellow Keeper users—or send a “One-Time Share” link to family, friends, or colleagues who don’t have the app.

The Keeper app supports two-factor authentication (2FA) into your Vault, along with storing and protecting TOTP codes for autofilling two-factor codes into other websites and apps. Use security keys like YubiKey NFC to secure your Vault using the highest level of MFA and 2FA protection.

Keep your passwords safe by having BreachWatch monitor the Dark Web for breached accounts and passwords. Get notified immediately if you have been exposed in a public data breach so you can take quick action to protect your online accounts.

Easily switch between multiple Keeper Password Manager accounts to separate your business and personal data.

Now available: Save and fill passkeys on websites and apps with Keeper and access them from any device.

Trusted by Millions of Users Globally
• "Password Manager of the Year" by PCMag
• "Best Overall" by U.S. News & World Report
• "Best Security" by Tom's Guide

The World’s Most Secure Password Manager
• Keeper’s patented zero-knowledge security ensures that your Keeper Vault and all of the data in it is fully encrypted.
• Supports two-factor authentication methods such as Google Authenticator, Microsoft Authenticator, Duo, RSA, YubiKey and more.
• Utilizes AES-256-bit encryption, Elliptic Curve and PBKDF2 technology.
• SOC-2, ISO 27001, ISO 27017 and ISO 20718 certified.
• FedRAMP and StateRAMP Authorized.
• Secrets Management, SDKs, CLI and DevOps integrations for Enterprise customers.

Keeper is compatible with all browsers including:
• Chrome
• Brave
• DuckDuckGo
• Opera
• Internet Explorer
• Firefox
• Safari
• Edge

Easily import your passwords from:
• Apple iCloud Keychain
• Google Chrome
• Dashlane
• 1Password
• LastPass
• Bitwarden
• Nordpass
• and more!

Keeper Password Manager Supports the following Record Types:
• Login & password credentials
• Payment and credit cards
• Address
• Bank account
• Secure files and notes
• Photo
• Driver's license and identity cards
• Birth certificate
• Database credentials
• Server
• Membership
• Passport
• Software license
• SSH Key

Keeper uses the AccessibilityService API for KeeperFill, which allows you to securely autofill login credentials across mobile apps and browsers. Keeper is a zero-knowledge security platform.

Need assistance? Visit https://keepersecurity.com/support.

Privacy Policy: https://keepersecurity.com/privacypolicy.html
Terms of Use: https://keepersecurity.com/termsofuse.html

raw_data.releaseNotes: A New Way to Import: You can now securely import passwords, passkeys, and two-factor codes directly from other apps on iOS 26. When exporting from a supported source, simply select Keeper from the list to have your records securely transferred.

apps.title: When I Work Staff Scheduling
apps.description:
Join more than 200,000 workplaces running on When I Work to reduce chaos, costs, and turnover with employee scheduling and time tracking for the modern workforce. When I Work is an employee scheduling app that does more than just save you time on scheduling. It also helps you improve communication, eliminate excuses, boost accountability among your staff, track time and attendance, and grow your business.

“2021 Shortlist” - Capterra
“2021 Category Leader” - Getapp
"Fastest Implementation" - G2 Crowd

MANAGERS LOVE IT:

• Easy to use time clock to clock in and out 
• Message with staff 1:1 or in groups 
• Monitor and approve shift trades and time off requests
• View the entire staff schedule anywhere at anytime
• Create a work calendar to efficiently plan schedules
• Quickly alert staff of changes and updates to the schedule
• Messaging and scheduling permissions for easier management
• Geofencing features to prevent buddy punching

EMPLOYEES LOVE IT:

• Clock in and out of shifts from the app
• Instantly trade shifts with coworkers
• View work schedules from anywhere at anytime
• Pick up extra hours with open shifts
• Check the work calendar to easily request time off 
• Privately message coworkers 1:1 or in groups within the app
• Easily check who's working which shifts

WHEN I WORK FEATURES:

When I Work is employee-focused and built exclusively for shift-based workplaces. We monitor our systems 24/7/365 to give you and your employees peace of mind that your data is safe and secure. Choose When I Work to get the best in: 

• Team management - Onboard new employees, approve time off requests, review shift trades, and fill shifts in seconds.

• Team accountability - Shift confirmation, mobile clock in, shift task lists, team task lists, and chat ensure everyone is on the same page.

• Team communication - Notify your team of changes instantly and communicate with coworkers 1:1 or in group chats.

• Team empowerment - Your team can manage availability, submit time-off requests, and collaborate on shift trades.

• One-click scheduling - Build your entire work schedule in one click with Auto Scheduling.

• Confident shift coverage - Receive shift confirmations from employees and be notified immediately of swaps and drops.

• Share schedules - Publish the schedule and your whole team is instantly notified of their shifts.

• Labor forecasting - Easy-to-use labor tools help you manage your labor budget efficiently.

• Control overtime costs - Get overtime alerts and labor reporting to make managing labor costs easier.

• Schedule enforcement - Limit clock ins to shifts and locations to ensure that everyone is where they need to be at the right time.

• Payroll integration - Import your timesheets to quickly and accurately process payroll.

• Labor reports - Use labor distribution to manage costs and forecast for the future.

Terms of use: https://wheniwork.com/terms
Privacy policy: https://wheniwork.com/privacy

raw_data.releaseNotes:
We're always tweaking and improving our app to make sure you get the best experience possible.

We appreciate your continued support and feedback! If you encounter any issues or have suggestions for future updates, please contact our support team at support@wheniwork.com.

apps.title: Microsoft Bing Search
apps.description:
Microsoft Bing delivers fast, intelligently curated answers and makes it easier than ever to discover more. 

Introducing Copilot Search in Bing
Copilot Search in Bing brings AI to search where clear answers and key information are quickly curated at the top of your search results. Kickstart your next discovery with a new search to unlock the possibilities of where your curiosity can take you.

Unlock answers faster 
Copilot Search in Bing brings intelligence to search so you can spend less time searching and more time discovering. Depending on your query, you’ll get an easy-to-scan layout of information, a summary of the most critical points, or a clear answer. No more hunting across the web.

Explore deeper 
Need to dive deeper? The next answer or new angle is waiting for you with helpful web links and clickable follow-up topics. It brings the best of traditional and generative search together to help you find what you need – and discover more.

Discover confidently
Perfect for when you want to go heads-down to write a paper, learn something new, explore a passion project, or simply let your curiosity wonder. Choose from a variety of suggested queries to start your journey or simply start a new search to harness the power of AI to get curated results. 

Try Copilot Search in Bing today!

All the highlights

New homepage: Stay updated on topics you're following, and get quick access to Microsoft features
Copilot Search in Bing: Seamlessly find a topic to explore within your everyday search flow
Image Creator: Create images from words with AI
Visual search: Search right from your camera or by uploading a picture
Voice search: Tap the mic icon and use your voice to search
Microsoft Rewards: Earn more rewards is easy, simple, and fun. Just search with the Microsoft Bing app and you’ll earn faster than ever
Weather: See the forecast for today and the week ahead
Wallpaper: Pick from a collection of beautiful images featured on the Bing homepage

Functions mentioned above not available in all markets, actual features and display contents may vary.

Weather: See the forecast for today and the week ahead
Wallpaper: Pick from a collection of beautiful images featured on the Bing homepage

Functions mentioned above not available in all markets, actual features and display contents may vary.

apps.title: Time4Care
apps.description:
Time4Care™ is an “on the go” time entry and approval app for home and community-based services programs.

As a service provider, Time4Care makes it easy to enter your hours quickly and accurately as soon as you work them – no longer do you need to remember what hours you worked from two weeks back.  The easy to view screens and clear language make it easy to log and track your time on the app as you go each day.  Using Time4Care, you can submit your hours, services, activities, and notes “on the go.”  

As an Employer, Time4Care allows you to easily view and approve or reject your Employees’ submitted hours.  The app makes it easy to access and complete this important step so that your workers are paid accurately and on time!    

Time4Care offers these user-friendly features:

    •  Ability to review and edit hours, activities, and notes before submitting them for Employer approval
    •  Clock In/Clock Out timer to easily keep track of hours worked in “real time”
    •  Manual time entry if you prefer to enter your hours without using the timer function
    •  Offline mode to record your time without Internet connection
    •  Timesheet review allows Employers to approve submitted time using a mobile device

*Time4Care also supports Electronic Visit Verification (EVV) for time capture in compliance with the 21st Century Cures Act if required by your program. 

Tags: Public Partnerships LLC, Timesheet, Time Entry, timesheet status, Time4Care, Better at work, work hours, PPL Portal, EVV

apps.title: DoneStack
apps.description:
DoneStack is an innovative journal that maximizes your productivity. Complementary to traditional to-do lists, DoneStack records what you have already done everyday. While to-do lists guide you on what to do, DoneStack boosts your motivation and momentum to actually do more. You will start to see each moment as an opportunity to add small but meaningful items to your done stack,  and these moments eventually add up to your most productive days. From your stack of done items, you can then visualize, measure, and improve your productivity on a daily and weekly basis. Best of all, you get all these benefits with minimal effort and overhead. DoneStack’s secret sauce is its design that lets you effortlessly record done items from scratch or from your tasks and habits. You’ll have to try it to experience its speed and efficiency.

DoneStack is for you if you want to:

• Be more productive each day
• Establish and focus on your priorities
• Understand and improve how you are spending your time

Here is what we have in store for you.

Prioritize your life: Establish your priorities through buckets. Each bucket captures an area of your life you want to focus on. They can be general areas like “Learning” or “Self-Improvement”, or specific pursuits like “Piano” or “Basketball”. Buckets ensure that you are not just productive, but also devoting time on the right things.

Track your day: DoneStack makes tracking items nearly effortless. Simply type in what you did, and optionally pick a bucket and size. The XS through XL size system leverages exponentially spaced intervals to quickly track time spent without sacrificing accuracy. You have to try it to see its efficiency.

Visualize your productivity: Physically see your productivity as you stack completed items throughout the day. Items in your stack are color coded by bucket and sized by time spent. Your daily stack is not only informative; building your stack is extremely fun and motivating! Next time you are idle and well rested, you’ll definitely feel the urge to keep stacking!

Build motivation and momentum: Did we mention that building your stack was fun and motivating? One big benefit to using DoneStack is how you start your day. The app encourages you to simply get started, and adding the first item to your stack each day is especially rewarding. From there, each item you stack builds momentum for the next item, until you end up with a fulfilling day.

Plan ahead: The built-in tasks and habits list also lets you plan ahead. Pre-record tasks you plan to do in the near future, so you can add them later to your stack of done items with one tap. Habits let you record items you will do repeatedly, so you can add them to your done stack anytime.

Improve time management: DoneStack also has time tracking built in. See exactly how much time you are spending on each bucket on a daily and weekly basis. You can also set time spent goals, and analyze your time spent trends to identify areas of improvement.

DoneStack is available to use for free. You can optionally upgrade to DoneStack Premium. While the free version of DoneStack allows you to customize 2 buckets, the premium subscription allows you to create an unlimited number of buckets. This will allow you to use DoneStack across all your priorities in life!

Terms of Use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/
Privacy Policy: https://www.donestack.app/privacy-policy/

apps.title: Count Pomodoros
apps.description:
Let time create value and be the end of fragmented time!

Count Tomatoes – Never time alone again. Stay highly focused with users worldwide and enter your own study room or virtual office space.

Multiple timing modes: Supports both Pomodoro and Single-Core modes, helping you work and study more efficiently.
No login required: Use most features without registration, skipping the hassle and starting your productivity journey right away.
Simple and efficient: A clean, intuitive interface with no learning curve, instantly boosting your productivity.
Data security: We prioritize your data security, supporting iCloud sync and backup to ensure your information is always safe.
Continuous innovation: With Pomodoro Technique at its core, the app integrates the essence of various productivity methods and keeps evolving to offer you the best experience.
